Key.Original: Nomad
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"

Key.Original: Avenger
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"

Key.Original: Hawkeye
Key.Chinese: "鷹眼"
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰眼"

Key.Original: Eagle
Guardian
Key.Chinese: "守護者"
Key.Chinesesimp: "守护者"

Key.Original: Serpent
Key.Chinese: "海蛇"
Key.Chinesesimp: "海蛇"

Key.Original: Win
Key.Chinese: 勝利
Key.Chinesesimp: 胜利

Key.Original:
The Republic of Altis and Stratis sits at the center of an escalating global conflict. As the world stands on the brink of all-out war, NATO forces join the fray.

Complete the previous episode to unlock the next.
Key.Chinese:
阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和國成為了不斷升溫的全球衝突中心。在世界陷入全面戰爭的前一刻，北約部隊加入了戰局。

要遊玩本章節，請先完成前一章節。
Key.Chinesesimp:
阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国成为了不断升温的全球冲突中心。在世界陷入全面战争的边缘，北约部队加入了战局。

要游玩本章节，请先完成前一章节。

Key.Original: New Dawn
Key.Chinese: 新曙光
Key.Chinesesimp: 新曙光

Key.Original: Alpha-Green, we've got CASEVAC inbound. Pad Delta-2. Prep for casualties.
Key.Chinese: "Alpha-Green"，我們有傷員後送即將到來。在”Delta-2"停機坪。請準備好接受傷員。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法-绿"，我们有伤员后送即将到来。在"德尔塔-2"停机坪。请准备好接受伤员。

Key.Original: Sergeant Jones, please, deliver the signed form B-17 green to Lieutenant Barnes immediately.
Key.Chinese: 中士瓊斯，請立即交付簽名好的B-17綠表格給中尉巴恩斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 琼斯中士，请立即交付签名好的B-17绿表格给巴恩斯中尉。

Key.Original: Sergeant Jones, form B-17 green to Lieutenant Barnes immediately.
Key.Chinese: 中士瓊斯，請立即交付B-17綠表格給中尉巴恩斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士琼斯，请立即交付B-17绿表格给巴恩斯中尉。

Container.name: 21_broadcast
Container.situation: local generic broacast

Key.Original: Team Victor, assemble in meeting room 3-1.
Key.Chinese: "Victor"小隊，請到會議室3-1集合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 维克多小组，请到会议室3-1集合。

Key.Original: Team Victor to meeting room 3-1.
Key.Chinese: "Victor"小隊請到會議室3-1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 维克多小组请到会议室3-1。

Container.name: 20_broadcast
Container.situation: local broadcast calling kerry

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry, report to Colonel Armstrong.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里，請向上校阿姆斯特朗報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士，请向阿姆斯特朗上校报到。

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry to Colonel Armstrong.
Key.Chinese: 下士克里請找上校阿姆斯特朗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里下士请找阿姆斯特朗上校。

Container.name: 14_ambient_talk_04
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on base, when player is close.

Key.Original: Fucking snakes, man! They're everywhere!
Key.Chinese: 該死的蛇，老兄!他們到處都是!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死的蛇，老兄!它们到处都是!

Key.Original: Shit, at least they're quiet.
Key.Chinese: 恩，他們倒是挺安靜的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠，它们好在还挺安静的。

Key.Original: Those fucking cicadas on the other hand - they're driving me crazy.
Key.Chinese: 至少不像那些他媽的蟬叫聲-它們快要把我給逼瘋了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至少不像那些他妈的蝉叫声-他们快要把我给逼疯了。

Container.name: 13_ambient_talk_03
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on base, when player is close.

Key.Original: Our whole deployment's on the back foot because of that radar.
Key.Chinese: 我們在這裡的部屬，根本就只是為了那個雷達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在这里的部署，根本就只是为了那个雷达。

Key.Original: You been up there yet? It's way beyond repair.
Key.Chinese: 你還沒有去過那個地方?它看來已經是不能修復了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还没有去过那个地方?它看来已经是不能修复了。

Key.Original: We need to get it online ASAP.
Key.Chinese: 我們必須讓他盡快上線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们必须让它尽快上线。

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Container.name: 12_ambient_talk_02
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on base, when player is close.

Key.Original: I heard it was a budget thing.
Key.Chinese: 我聽說是預算的事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听说是预算的事。

Key.Original: It's bullshit - we could've been here much sooner - our battalion was prep'd in a day.
Key.Chinese: 狗屎-我們本來可以更快的抵達這裡-我們營1天就準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 狗屎-我们本来可以更快地抵达这里-我们营1天就准备好了。

Container.name: 11_ambient_talk_01
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on base, when player is close.

Key.Original: Stratis was a cakewalk. I wonder what went wrong on Altis.
Key.Chinese: 斯特拉蒂斯這邊根本小菜一碟。我倒想知道阿爾蒂斯上是出了什麼錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯特拉蒂斯这边根本小菜一碟。我倒想知道阿尔蒂斯上是出了什么错。

Key.Original: Yeah? I thought we were fighting Greenbacks?
Key.Chinese: 是嗎?我以為我們只會跟綠軍交戰?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是吗?我以为我们只会跟绿军交战?

Key.Original: The lieutenant said they ran into CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 中尉說他們遇見了廣協同盟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中尉说他们遇见了广协。

Key.Original: Who knows anymore, man.
Key.Chinese: 天知道還有什麼驚喜，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天知道还有什么惊喜，老兄。

Container.name: 10_ambient_talk_00
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: ambient chat, played randomly by soldiers on base, when player is close.

Key.Original: He's been hiding on Altis this whole time?
Key.Chinese: 他這段時間一直躲藏在阿爾蒂斯上?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他这段时间一直躲藏在阿尔蒂斯上?

Key.Original: Yeah, that's him. The 'guerrilla' guy.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，就是他。這個'游擊隊'傢伙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，就是他。这个"游击队来的"。

Container.name: 01_armory
Container.situation: brief intro conversation to armory, when player arrives there. player should have no weapon or at max. very light equipment. he should re-equip, take the standard loadout. not sure how to handle this.

Key.Original: Alright, you should have everything you need.
Key.Chinese: 好的，這裡應該有你想要的任何東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，这里应该有你想要的任何东西。

Key.Original: If you want to adjust your loadout, take whatever you want - ammo and magazines are in the boxes to your right.
Key.Chinese: 假如你想調整你的裝備，你可以隨意拿取-彈藥的箱子就在你的右手邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你想调整你的装备，你可以随意拿取-弹药的箱子就在你的右手边。

Key.Original: Once you're done, proceed to the assembly point outside.
Key.Chinese: 當你準備好後，你就可以前往外面的集合點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你准备好后，你就可以前往外面的集合点。

Container.name: 00_briefing
Container.situation: stage c briefing and situation recap.

Key.Original: Gentlemen, as you may have heard, our forces on Altis were unable to secure the airport.
Key.Chinese: 先生們，正如你們所聽到的，我們在阿爾蒂斯上的部隊並沒有成功肅清機場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 先生们，正如你们所听到的，我们在阿尔蒂斯岛上的部队并没有成功肃清机场。

Key.Original: At ease, Corporal Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 稍息，下士克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 稍息，下士克里。

Key.Original: Lucky for you, command doesn't feel likewise.
Key.Chinese: 你很幸運，指揮部並沒有跟我的想法一致。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你很走运，指挥部并没有像我这么想。

Key.Original: But make no mistake, you fuck up just once - you endanger any of my men - and you're gone.
Key.Chinese: 但請不要搞錯，只要你搞砸一次-危及到我的任何手下-你就完了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但你给我听好了，只要你搞砸一次-危及到我的任何手下-你就完了。

Key.Original: As it turns out, there wasn't a chance in hell that we were ready for what awaited us.
Key.Chinese: 事實證明，我們並不知道在前方還有什麼困難在等待著我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实证明，我们根本就不知道在前方还有什么困难在等待着我们。

Key.Original: CSAT got one over on us this time - and intel suggests they're ready to hit back at any moment.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟再次領先了我們-情報指出他們已經準備要發動反攻了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协再次抢了我们的先手-而且情报指出他们已经准备随时发动反攻了。

Key.Original: Truth is, if we don't hold what we've taken over here, this whole operation is a wash.
Key.Chinese: 事實是，假如我們不能守住我們已經得到的領土，這場行動就要付諸東流了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实是，假如我们不能守住我们已经得到的领土，这场行动就要付诸东流了。

Key.Original: So - with Stratis under our control - we're going to head back and dig in.
Key.Chinese: 所以-既然斯特拉蒂斯已經在我們的控制之下-我們將回到主島上支援其他人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以-既然斯特拉蒂斯已经在我们的控制之下-我们将回到主岛上支援其他人。

Key.Original: Now, keep in mind - in spite of Corporal Kerry's 'debrief' - we're not exactly sure what's happened here.
Key.Chinese: 請記住一件事-雖然我們有下士克里的'匯報'-我們還是不能很確定這裡到底發生了什麼事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住一件事-虽然我们有克里下士的"简报"-我们还是不能很确定这里到底发生了什么事。

Key.Original: As such, keep an eye out for any suspicious activity.
Key.Chinese: 因此，請隨時留意任何可疑的活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因此，请随时留意任何可疑的活动。

Key.Original: Until MEDCOM says otherwise, 'Captain Miller' - along with his team - are not recognized as friendly.
Key.Chinese: 除非地中海通信系統有其他的通知，'上校米勒'與他的隊員-將暫時不被識別為友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 除非地中海司令部有其他的通知，'米勒上校'与他的小组-将暂时不被识别为友军。

Key.Original: And - while we're on the subject, Corporal - were it up to me, you'd be stuck here spit-shining latrines until a court-martial deemed you fit for duty.
Key.Chinese: 還有一個問題必須跟你說明，下士-你將會被留在我身邊執行任務，直到軍事法庭認為可以了，你才能恢復自由。
Key.Chinesesimp: 趁还没岔开话题，下士-这要是换我说了算，我就让你在这刷马桶刷到军事法庭认为你没毛病为止。

Key.Original: Dismissed.
Key.Chinese: 解散。
Key.Chinesesimp: 解散。

Key.Original: Following a botched invasion on Altis, Kerry is taken back to NATO's re-established base on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 第一次對阿爾蒂斯的入侵成效不好，克里被帶回到斯特拉蒂斯上北約重新建立的基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第一次对阿尔蒂斯的入侵成效不好，克里被带回到斯特拉蒂斯上北约重新建立的基地。

Key.Original:
Last night we launched a simultaneous attack on Stratis and Altis.

While we've been successful in capturing Stratis - re-establishing command over Stratis Air Base - NATO forces on Altis, in part due to CSAT involvement, have failed to secure the main airport.

Now, although we managed to regroup in the south, recon reports indicate our enemy is preparing a counterattack to drive us into the sea. Our forces here are readying to redeploy to the main island in support.

After his arrival to Stratis, Cpl. Kerry was quickly debriefed, describing the events of the AAF's surprise attack against our facilities. Although his information is somewhat inconsistent with NATO's own intel, his presence is requested by Col. Armstrong.
Key.Chinese:
昨晚，我們同時向斯特拉蒂斯與阿爾蒂斯發動了攻擊。

雖然我們成功拿回了斯特拉蒂斯-並重新建立起斯特拉蒂斯的空軍基地-但是在阿爾蒂斯上的北約部隊，由於有廣協同盟參與抵抗，導致我們無法順利拿下主機場。

現在，我們正試圖重新集結我們南部的軍隊，但偵察報告指出，敵人已經準備要進行反空了。我們這裡的部隊將前往阿爾蒂斯上提供支援給友軍。

在下士克里到達斯特拉蒂斯之後，他很快的就被進行匯報，描述阿爾蒂斯武裝力量是如何在剛開始的時候對我們發動突襲的。雖然他提供的情報與北約自己的情報有所出入，但他仍被上校阿姆斯特朗要求留下並繼續參與後續任務。
Key.Chinesesimp:
昨晚，我们同时向斯特拉蒂斯与阿尔蒂斯发动了攻击。

虽然我们成功拿回了斯特拉蒂斯-并恢复了对斯特拉蒂斯空军基地的指挥-但是在阿尔蒂斯上的北约部队，由于有广协参与抵抗，没能顺利拿下主机场。

现在，我们虽然已经在南部集结了军队，但侦察报告指出，敌人已经准备要进行反攻，要把我们赶下海了。我们这里的部队正准备前往阿尔蒂斯上提供支援给友军。

在克里下士到达斯特拉蒂斯之后，他很快被告知了现状，简报中描述了AAF是如何在刚开始的时候对我军设施发动突袭的。虽然他提供的情报与北约自己的情报有所出入，但他仍被阿姆斯特朗上校要求留下并继续参与后续任务。

Key.Original: You have disobeyed a direct order and are in breach of access permissions.
Key.Chinese: 你不服從命令，並違反進入權限進入到禁區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不服从命令，并违反进入权限进入到禁区。

Key.Original: You Have Left the Authorized Area
Key.Chinese: 你離開了授權區
Key.Chinesesimp: 你离开了授权区

Key.Original: Situation briefing begins in 5 minutes.
Key.Chinese: 將在5分鐘後開始狀況簡報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将在5分钟后开始状况简报。

Key.Original: BRIEFING REMINDER
Key.Chinese: 簡報提醒
Key.Chinesesimp: 简报提醒

Key.Original: Leaving for transit to Altis.
Key.Chinese: 向阿爾蒂斯開始進發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向阿尔蒂斯开始进发。

Key.Original: DEPARTING
Key.Chinese: 出發
Key.Chinesesimp: 出发

Key.Original: Departing in 5 minutes.
Key.Chinese: 將在5分鐘後出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将在5分钟后出发。

Key.Original: ASSEMBLE
Key.Chinese: 集合
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合

Key.Original: You are entering a restricted area!
Key.Chinese: 你正在進入禁區!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你正在进入禁区!

Key.Original: WARNING
Key.Chinese: 警告
Key.Chinesesimp: 警告

Key.Original: Access permissions breached!
Key.Chinese: 你沒有進入的權限!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没有进入的权限!

Key.Original: Assemble
Key.Chinese: 集合
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合

Key.Original: WARNING
Key.Chinese: 警告
Key.Chinesesimp: 警告

Key.Original: Choose your equipment and link up with the rest of your team at the assembly point.
Key.Chinese: 選擇你的裝備，並跟你剩下的隊友在集合點碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 选择你的装备，并跟你剩下的队友在集合点碰面。

Key.Original: Report in
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Key.Original: ASSEMBLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 集合點
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合点

Key.Original: Report to the officer for debriefing.
Key.Chinese: 向軍官報到並進行匯報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向军官报到以听取任务后简报。

Key.Original: REPORT IN
Key.Chinese: 報到
Key.Chinesesimp: 报到

Key.Original: Get to the armory and rearm for the next operation.
Key.Chinese: 前往軍械庫，重新武裝你自己，準備好下一個任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往军械库，重新武装你自己，准备好下一个任务。

Key.Original: ARMORY
Key.Chinese: 軍械庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 军械库

Key.Original: Rearm
Key.Chinese: 重新武裝
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新武装

Key.Original: Resurgent West
Key.Chinese: 復活的西方
Key.Chinesesimp: 复兴的西方

Key.Original: Although still under suspicion, Kerry returns to the NATO front-line on patrol duty.
Key.Chinese: 儘管仍受到懷疑，克里返回到北約的前線開始進行巡邏任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管仍受到怀疑，克里还是返回到北约前线执行巡逻。

Key.Original: Point Starfire
Key.Chinese: 星火點
Key.Chinesesimp: 星火点

Key.Original: Point Kilo
Key.Chinese: Kilo點
Key.Chinesesimp: 基洛点

Key.Original: Point Omicron
Key.Chinese: 奧米克戎點
Key.Chinesesimp: 奥米克戎点

Key.Original: Flanking
Key.Chinese: 側襲
Key.Chinesesimp: 侧击

Key.Original: Defenses
Key.Chinese: 防禦
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御

Key.Original: Although we suffered heavy losses, we held the line. CSAT have pulled back to the airfield for now, but we aren't going to take this lying down. With any luck, the politicians will be able to sort something out in time. Whatever happens, we are taking the airport. You've proven yourself to be a potentially useful liaison with the FIA, and an effective force in combat.
Key.Chinese: 儘管我們損失慘重，但我們成功守住了防線。廣協同盟現在撤回了機場，但我們可沒有要休息。指揮部夠快的話，應該很快就有計劃會出爐。不管如何，我們要拿下那座機場。你已經證明了你是跟自由獨立同盟聯絡的一個很好的橋樑，也證明了你還能戰鬥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管我们损失惨重，但我们成功守住了防线。广协现在撤回了机场，但我们可没有要休息。走运的话，政客们应该很快就能理清现状。不管如何，我们要拿下那座机场。你已经证明了你是跟自由独立同盟联络的一个很好的桥梁，也证明了你还能战斗。

Key.Original: Our forces on Altis were unable to secure %1the airport%2.%3As it turns out, there wasn't a chance in hell we were ready for what awaited us. CSAT got one over on us this time - and intel suggests they're going to hit back at any moment.%4Truth is, if we don't hold what we've taken over there, the whole op's a wash. So - with Stratis under our control - we're going to head back and dig in.%5Now, keep in mind - in spite of Corporal Kerry's 'debrief' - we don't know what exactly happened here. As such, keep an eye open for any suspicious activity. Until MEDCOM says otherwise, this 'Captain Miller', along with his team, are not recognized as friendly.
Key.Chinese: 我們在阿爾蒂斯上的部隊並沒有成功的肅清%1機場%2。%3事實證明，我們並不知道在前方還有什麼困難在等待著我們。廣協同盟再次領先了我們-情報指出他們已經準備要發動反攻了。%4事實是，假如我們不能守住我們已經得到的領土，這場行動就要付諸東流了。所以-既然斯特拉蒂斯已經在我們的控制之下-我們將回到主島上支援其他人。%5請記住一件事-雖然我們有下士克里的'匯報'-我們還是不能很確定這裡到底發生了什麼事。因此，請隨時留意任何可疑的活動。除非地中海通信系統有其他的通知，'上校米勒'與他的隊員-將暫時不被識別為友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在阿尔蒂斯上的部队并没有成功的肃清%1机场%2。%3事实证明，我们并不知道在前方还有什么困难在等待着我们。广协再次领先了我们-情报指出他们已经准备要发动反攻了。%4事实是，假如我们不能守住我们已经得到的领土，这场行动就要付诸东流了。所以-既然斯特拉蒂斯已经在我们的控制之下-我们将回到主岛上支援其他人。%5请记住一件事-虽然我们有下士克里的'汇报'-我们还是不能很确定这里到底发生了什么事。因此，请随时留意任何可疑的活动。除非地中海司令部有其他的通知，'上校米勒'与他的小组-将暂时不被识别为友军。

Key.Original: Regroup
Key.Chinese: 集合
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 集合
Key.Chinesesimp: 集合

Key.Original: CSAT are making their move. Regroup with %1the rest of your team%2.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟開始行動了。請立即跟%1你其他的隊員%2集合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协开始行动了。请立即跟%1你其他的队员%2集合。

Key.Original: Patrol
Key.Chinese: 巡邏
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻

Key.Original: PATROL
Key.Chinese: 巡邏
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻

Key.Original: Patrol the south of %1Katalaki%2 until ordered otherwise.
Key.Chinese: 請在%1卡塔拉基%2的南邊進行巡邏，並等待更進一步的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请在%1卡塔拉基%2的南边进行巡逻，并等待更进一步的命令。

Key.Original: Join Delta 3-1
Key.Chinese: 加入"Delta3-1"
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入"德尔塔3-1"

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Your team is down. Rendezvous with Delta 3-1 and assist with the defense.
Key.Chinese: 你的小隊已經陣亡了。請與"Delta3-1"會合並協助防禦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的小组已经全灭了。请与"德尔塔3-1"会合并协助防御。

Key.Original: Meet the FIA
Key.Chinese: 與自由獨立同盟碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 与自由独立同盟碰面

Key.Original: MEET
Key.Chinese: 碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面

Key.Original: The FIA are willing to assist NATO forces. Regroup with them %1here%2.
Key.Chinese: 自由獨立同盟願意協助北約部隊。請與他們在%1這裡%2碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自由独立同盟愿意协助北约部队。请与他们在%1这里%2碰面。

Key.Original: Secure Eastern Defenses
Key.Chinese: 肅清東區防禦
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清东区防御

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Coordinate with Delta 3-1 to retake %1the eastern defenses%2.
Key.Chinese: 與"Delta3-1"合作，重新奪回%1東區防禦%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"德尔塔3-1"合作，重新夺回%1东区防御%2。

Key.Original: Defend Neochori
Key.Chinese: 防守内奧霍里
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御内奥霍里

Container.name: x15_Support_APC_Destroyed
Container.situation: kerry is told that the second apc supporting them has been destroyed.

Key.Original: Kerry, Delta 3-2 is unresponsive! Looks like we lost them! Out!
Key.Chinese: 克里，"Delta3-2"沒有回應!看來我們已經失去他們了!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，"德尔塔3-2"没有回应!看来我们已经失去他们了!通话完毕!

Container.name: x10_Squad_Dead
Container.situation: kerry is told that the squad supporting him have been killed.

Key.Original: All units, be advised, we've lost comms with Delta-3-1! Presumed KIA! Out!
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請注意，我們已經與"Delta3-1"失去聯繫!推斷已經全員陣亡!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请注意，我们已经与"德尔塔3-1"失去联系!推断已经全员阵亡!通话完毕!

Container.name: x05_APC_Destroyed
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: kerry is told that the apc was destroyed.

Key.Original: Nomad, we've lost the Marshall! I say again, the Marshall is down!
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們失去"警長"裝甲戰鬥車!我重複一遍，裝甲戰鬥車已經毀了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们失去了"警长"!我重复一遍，"警长"装甲车已经毁了!

Container.name: x01_Engaged_SF
Container.situation: kerry engaged the csat landing craft despite being ordered not to.

Key.Original: Kerry, I told you to disengage! You're not going to fuck this up for the rest of us!
Key.Chinese: 克里，我已經叫你不要交戰了!你這樣做只會危害到我們其他人的安全!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我已经叫你不要交战了!你可别搞砸了把我们也一块害死!

Container.name: i05_Defenses
Container.situation: hq tells kerry to use the defenses to hold off the counterattack.

Key.Original: Kerry, did you get a chance to check the defenses?
Key.Chinese: 克里，你有沒有檢查過那些防禦設施?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你有没有检查过那些防御设施?

Key.Original: Copy! Don't forget to use them against the armor!
Key.Chinese: 收到!請不要忘了使用它們來抵禦裝甲載具!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到!请不要忘了使用它们来抵御装甲载具!

Key.Original: I'm sure you'll find some supplies lying around out there, too! Hold the line! Out!
Key.Chinese: 我很確定你附近應該還有很多補給!請守住防線!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很确定你附近应该还能找到很多补给!请守住防线!通话完毕!

Key.Original: Yes, Sir. Everything seems mostly intact. Over.
Key.Chinese: 是，長官。所有東西看起來都還可以用。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，长官。大部分东西看起来都还可以用。完毕。

Container.name: i01_Flanking
Container.situation: hq tells kerry to stay out of the town.

Key.Original: Kerry, avoid going through Neochori! You'll have less resistance if you flank north!
Key.Chinese: 克里，請避免直接穿過内奧霍里!你可以迂迴到北方，這樣阻力會比較小!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，请避免直接穿过内奥霍里!你可以迂回到北方，这样阻力会比较小!

Key.Original: Be careful, though! 2-2 are reporting contacts on all sides! Crossroads out!
Key.Chinese: 但還是要小心!"2-2"回報該區還是有一些敵人的!"交叉路"通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 但还是要小心!"2-2"回报该区还是有一些敌人的!"交叉路口"通话完毕!

Container.name: 95_Defenses_Secured
Container.situation: kerry successfully clears the northern defenses.

Key.Original: Copy, Nomad! Wait one!
Key.Chinese: 收到，"游牧民"!請稍等!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"游牧民"!请稍等!

Key.Original: Nomad, priority message! Intel indicates enemy armor inbound from the airport!
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，緊急訊息!情報指出敵軍的裝甲部隊正從機場向你們的位置進發!
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，紧急信息!情报指出敌军的装甲部队正从机场向你们的位置进发!

Key.Original: Crossroads, Nomad here, defenses secured. Requesting reinforcements. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"游牧民"，防禦陣地已肅清。請求更多的增援。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"游牧民"，防御阵地已肃清。请求更多的增援。完毕。

Key.Original: I need you to hold that position! We lose it, and we lose Neochori! How copy?
Key.Chinese: 我要你們守住該位置!如果我們失守了，内奧霍里也就會失守!有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我要你们守住阵地!如果我们丢了这个阵地，内奥霍里也就会失守!有收到吗?

Container.name: 90_Sea_Assault
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: friendly forces spot the seaborne attack force.

Key.Original: We've got boats incoming!
Key.Chinese: 有船隻在靠近中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 有船只在靠近!

Key.Original: Delta-3-2, interdict! Out!
Key.Chinese: "Delta-3-2"，請阻止他們!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔"-3-2，拦截他们!通话完毕!

Container.name: 85_No_Gunships
Container.situation: crossroads tells kerry that they can't get gunships airborne.

Key.Original: Nomad, be advised, we're holding our own here but the Blackfoots can't get off the ground!
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，請注意，我們這裡的"黑足"暫時還無法起飛!
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，请注意，我们这里的"黑足"暂时还无法起飞!

Key.Original: Looks like you're going to be on your own for a bit longer! Over!
Key.Chinese: 看來你們得靠自己撐一段時間了!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来你们得靠自己多撑一段时间了!完毕!

Key.Original: Understood, Crossroads!
Key.Chinese: 了解，"交叉路"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"交叉路口"!

Container.name: 80_Taking_Command
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: kerry is ordered to take command of the fia team.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Crossroads!
Key.Chinese: 了解，"交叉路"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"交叉路口"!

Key.Original: Let's move it, people!
Key.Chinese: 我們走吧，兄弟們!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走吧，兄弟们!

Key.Original: The rest of you, push through the west! We'll take the northern flank!
Key.Chinese: 其餘的人，從西方進行推進!我們要拿下他們的北翼!
Key.Chinesesimp: 其余的人，从西方进行推进!我们要拿下他们的北翼!

Key.Original: Solid copy! Out!
Key.Chinese: 完整收到!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到!通话完毕!

Container.name: 75_Take_Command
Container.situation: kerry is ordered to take command of the fia team.

Key.Original: Kerry - I don't much like it - but I need you to step up!
Key.Chinese: 克里-雖然我不太喜歡這樣-但我需要你站出來指揮!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里-虽然我不太喜欢这样-但我需要你站出来指挥!

Key.Original: We've lost the east! If we don't take it back, they'll punch straight through our lines!
Key.Chinese: 我們失去東邊防線了!假如我們不能奪回它，敵軍將會直衝我們的主力!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们失去东边防线了!假如我们不能夺回它，敌军将会直接突破我们的防线!

Key.Original: Take the guerrillas and hit those defenses! Your new callsign is Nomad.
Key.Chinese: 帶著那些反抗軍並奪回防禦陣地!你新的呼號是"游牧民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带着那些反抗军并夺回防御阵地!你新的呼号是"游牧民"。

Key.Original: Delta-3-1, I want you to assist! How copy?
Key.Chinese: "Delta-3-1"，我要你幫忙協助!有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔-3-1"，我要你帮忙协助!有收到吗?

Container.name: 70_FIA
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC I Nikos;EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: the fia contact nato, kerry specifically.

Key.Original: Kerry, we're going to form up on that tree line! Suggest you meet them there! Over!
Key.Chinese: 克里，我們正要去樹林線那邊!建議你可以與他們在那邊碰面!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我们正要去树林线那边!建议你可以与他们在那边碰面!完毕!

Key.Original: Kerry, I've got someone on the line. He says he'll only speak to you directly.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我有一個人在線上。他說他只想直接與你對話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我有一个人在线上。他说他只想直接与你对话。

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Corporal!
Key.Chinese: 聽到了，下士!
Key.Chinesesimp: 听到了，下士!

Key.Original: American, it's Nikos.
Key.Chinese: 美國佬，我是尼科斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬，我是尼科斯。

Key.Original: Do as Delta says, Kerry! Over!
Key.Chinese: 照"Delta"所說的，克里!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 照"德尔塔"所说的做，克里!完毕!

Key.Original: Listen, there's little time. Our brothers are engaging those gunships.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，剛剛有段時間。我們的弟兄正在與那些武裝直升機交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，时间不多了。我们的弟兄正在攻击那些武装直升机。

Key.Original: They're close to you. On my order, they'll assist you as needed. Over.
Key.Chinese: 他們很靠近你。我已經下令，他們會盡所有能力來支援你。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们很靠近你。我已经下令，他们会尽所有能力来支援你。完毕。

Key.Original: Nikos? Shit, man, it's good to hear from you!
Key.Chinese: 尼科斯?該死，老兄，真高興聽見你的聲音!
Key.Chinesesimp: 尼科斯?该死，老兄，真高兴听见你的声音!

Key.Original: Crossroads, did you hear that? Over!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，你有聽到嗎?完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，你有听到吗?完毕!

Key.Original: Understood. They will meet you there, American. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。他們會在那裡等你，美國佬。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。他们会在那里等你，美国佬。通话完毕。

Container.name: 65_APC_Engage
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: apcs spot enemy targets.

Key.Original: Multiple alpha victors on sensor! Preparing to engage!
Key.Chinese: 多名目標被傳感器給檢測到!請準備好交戰!
Key.Chinesesimp: 传感器检测到多个敌方车辆!正准备交战!

Container.name: 60_Pushing
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: the reinforcements move in.

Key.Original: Copy, Crossroads. Delta's rolling! Out!
Key.Chinese: 收到，"交叉路"。"Delta"開始移動!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"交叉路口"。"德尔塔"开始移动!通话完毕!

Key.Original: Alright! Gun it, guys!
Key.Chinese: 好吧!讓我們上吧，兄弟!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧!让我们上吧，兄弟!

Container.name: 55_Push
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract B;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: kerry boards the apc and moves with the reinforcements.

Key.Original: Crossroads, we're good to go! Just say the word!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我們準備好了!就等你下令!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我们准备好了!就等你下令!

Key.Original: Roger that, 3-1! Move in! Go! Go!
Key.Chinese: 了解，3-1!開始進發!衝!衝!
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，3-1!开始开进!冲!冲!

Key.Original: I'm in!
Key.Chinese: 我進來了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我进来了!

Container.name: 50_Anti_Air
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: the fia begin to engage csat's gunships.

Key.Original: Crossroads, someone's engaging the gunships! They're bugging out!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，有人正在向敵軍武裝直升機開火!它們倉皇撤退了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，有人正在向敌军武装直升机开火!它们仓皇撤退了!

Key.Original: It's not one of us, sir! What the hell's going on? Over!
Key.Chinese: 他們並不是我們的人，長官!現在的狀況是怎樣?完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们并不是我们的人，长官!现在的状况是怎样?完毕!

Key.Original: Unclear, 2-1! Just sustain the pressure! Out!
Key.Chinese: 不清楚，2-1!請先保持警戒!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不清楚，2-1!请先保持警戒!通话完毕!

Container.name: 45_Plan
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: kerry is ordered to go with the apcs.

Key.Original: You can link up with us, Corporal!
Key.Chinese: 你可以與我們會合，下士!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以与我们会合，下士!

Key.Original: Confirmed! Kerry, assist Delta with the defense! Out!
Key.Chinese: 確認!克里，請協助"Delta"進行防守!通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认!克里，请协助"德尔塔"进行防守!通话完毕!

Container.name: 40_Defend
Container.situation: crossroads issues the order to defend against the attack.

Key.Original: I want all remaining AA platforms online now!
Key.Chinese: 我要所有剩下的防空陣地立刻給我上線!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我要所有剩下的防空阵地立刻给我上线!

Key.Original: Delta-3-1, divert to assist Charlie at Neochori! Over!
Key.Chinese: "Delta-3-1"，請前往内奧霍里協助"查理"!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔-3-1"，请前往内奥霍里协助"查理"!完毕!

Key.Original: Crossroads, my whole unit's gone! What are my orders? Over!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我的小隊已經覆滅了!我現在的命令是?完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我的整个部队已经覆灭了!我现在的命令是什么?完毕!

Container.name: 35_Attack
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: csat destroy nato aa and begin their attack.

Key.Original: This is Charlie-2-2! Confirmed! Over!
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"查理"-2-2!他說的沒錯!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"查理"-2-2!他说的没错!完毕!

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Delta-3-1! We're on station! Orders? Over!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"Delta-3-1"!我們就定位了!命令是?完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"德尔塔-3-1"!我们就位了!命令是?完毕!

Key.Original: All units, status report! What the hell just happened?
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，狀況回報!到底天殺的發生了什麼事情?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，状况回报!到底他妈的发生了什么事情?

Key.Original: Somebody tell me what the fuck just blew up! Over!
Key.Chinese: 誰能告訴我剛剛是啥鬼東西爆炸了!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁能告诉我刚刚是啥鬼东西爆炸了!完毕!

Key.Original: Crossroads, it's Kerry! It looks like we've just lost all of them, sir! Over!
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是克里!看來他們已經全部都被做掉了，長官!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是克里!看来他们已经全部都被做掉了，长官!完毕!

Key.Original: What do you mean all of them, Corporal?
Key.Chinese: 你的意思是，下士?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说全部都被做掉了是几个意思，下士?

Key.Original: Uh - our AA - Omicron - Kilo, and... Starfire! I can see the fires from here!
Key.Chinese: 呃-我們的防空陣地-"奧米克戎"-"Kilo"，還有..."星火"!我從這裡就可以看到那邊的火光!
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃-我们的防空阵地-"奥米克戎"-"基洛"，还有..."星火"!我从这里就可以看到那边的火光!

Container.name: 30_Team_Dead
Container.situation: kerry finds his team dead.

Key.Original: Oh, fuck!
Key.Chinese: 喔，幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，操!

Container.name: 25_Mobilization
Container.situation: crossroads informs units of csat mobilization.

Key.Original: All units, intel indicates enemy mobilization at the airport and capital. Presumed counter-offensive inbound.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，情報指出敵軍在機場與首都的軍隊皆已開始動員。推測反攻行動已經開始。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，情报指出敌军在机场与首都的军队都已开始动员。推测反攻行动已经开始。

Key.Original: Report to your CO, assume defensive positions and prepare for contact. Out.
Key.Chinese: 各自向你們的長官報到，鞏固防禦陣地並準備交戰。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各自向你们的长官报到，巩固防御阵地并准备交战。通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_QRF
Container.participants: EPC B Member;EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: kerry's co requests reinforcements.

Key.Original: Copy 2-4, dispatching Delta-3-1 as QRF to your pos. Wait one. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到2-4，正在派遣"Delta-3-1"做為快速應變部隊到你們的位置。請稍等。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到2-4，正在派遣"德尔塔-3-1"做为快速反应部队到你们的位置。请稍等。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Charlie-2-4, possible enemy landing craft hitting Katalaki. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，"Charlie-2-4"，發現疑似敵軍登陸艇正在靠近卡塔拉基中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，"查理"-2-4，发现疑似敌军登陆艇正在靠近卡塔拉基。完毕。

Container.name: 15_Contact
Container.situation: kerry reports the landing craft to his co.

Key.Original: Lieutenant, I've got Zodiacs on the coast here.
Key.Chinese: 中尉，我在海岸這邊發現了幾臺突擊艇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中尉，我在海岸这边发现了几艘突击艇。

Key.Original: Correct me if I'm wrong, but I don't think we had any exercises planned. Confirm, over.
Key.Chinese: 如果我有錯的話，請你糾正我，但我不覺得今天我軍有任何的演習計劃。請確認，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我有错的话，请你纠正我，但我不觉得今天我军有任何的演习计划。请确认，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, Corporal. Disengage and regroup on me. I'll call it in.
Key.Chinese: 收到，下士。請勿交戰並與我們會合。我來向總部回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，下士。请勿交战并与我们会合。我来向总部回报。

Container.name: 10_Boats
Container.situation: kerry spots csat landing craft.

Key.Original: What the..?
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼..?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么..?

Container.name: 105_Attack_Defeated
Container.situation: kerry successfully defeats the enemy armor.

Key.Original: Confirmed, Corporal. The situation's finally under control over here!
Key.Chinese: 了解，下士。現在的狀況終於讓我們給控制住了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，下士。现在的状况终于让我们给控制住了!

Key.Original: All units, hold your positions. We're not out of this yet! Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，堅守原地。我們在這裡的活兒還沒結束!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，坚守原地。我们在这里的活儿还没结束!通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Nomad here, enemy armored assault defeated. Awaiting further orders, over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，"游牧民"在這，敵軍裝甲部隊的突擊已被打敗。正在等待更進一步的命令，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，"游牧民"在这，敌军装甲部队的突击已被打败。正在等待更进一步的命令，完毕。

Container.name: 100_Defend
Container.situation: kerry successfully clears the northern defenses.

Key.Original: Delta-3-2, assist Nomad with the defense! Crossroads out!
Key.Chinese: "Delta-3-2"，請協助"游牧民"進行防守!"交叉路"通話完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔-3-2"，请协助"游牧民"进行防守!"交叉路口"通话完毕!

Key.Original: Solid copy, Crossroads! We'll do our best!
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"交叉路"!我們會盡我們最大的努力!
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"交叉路口"!我们会尽我们最大的努力!

Container.name: 05_Bullshit
Container.situation: kerry's sick of this detail.

Key.Original: Jesus, someone shoot me already.
Key.Chinese: 天啊，快點找個人來把我給幹掉吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊，赶紧来个人打死我得了。

Container.name: 01_Report
Container.situation: kerry's new co grills him about missing his report window.

Key.Original: All quiet on the eastern front, Lieutenant.
Key.Chinese: 東區防線一切正常，中尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 东区防线一切正常，中尉。

Key.Original: Feels like I'm guarding a garbage dump. Over.
Key.Chinese: 感覺我就像是在守一個垃圾場。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感觉我就像是在守一个垃圾场。完毕。

Key.Original: Corporal, I'm missing an update here. Report.
Key.Chinese: 下士，你那邊的狀況怎樣。回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士，你那边的状况怎样。回报。

Key.Original: That's because you are, Kerry. Out.
Key.Chinese: 那是因為你的確是在垃圾場，克里。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为你本来就是在守垃圾场，克里。通话完毕。

Key.Original: CSAT are launching a last-ditch effort to break through our defenses. Hold the line.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟正在做出最後的努力，想要打破我們的防線。請守住他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协正在做出最后的努力，企图突破我们的防线。守住防线。

Key.Original: Air Superiority
Key.Chinese: 空中優勢
Key.Chinesesimp: 空中优势

Key.Original: In preparation for a major assault on the main airport, Kerry coordinates FIA forces as NATO form up near Neochori.
Key.Chinese: 為了準備對機場的主要突擊，克里帶著自由獨立同盟部隊與北約在内奧霍里附近待命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为了准备对机场的主要突击，克里在北约部队向内奥霍里附近集结的同时调度起自由独立同盟的部队。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Assemble at the LZ
Key.Chinese: 在降落點會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 在降落点会合

Key.Original: Assemble your squad at the %1LZ%2.
Key.Chinese: 與你的小隊員在%1降落點%2會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与你的班在%1降落点%2会合。

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Secure the LZ
Key.Chinese: 肅清降落點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清降落点

Key.Original: Make sure the %2LZ%1 is clear so %3Golf%1 can safely pick you up.
Key.Chinese: 請確保%2降落點%1是安全的，這樣才能讓%3"Golf"%1來安全的接送你們小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请确保%2降落点%1是安全的，这样才能让%3"高尔夫"%1来安全的接送你们小队。

Key.Original: DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 摧毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁

Key.Original: Eliminate the AA Threat
Key.Chinese: 摧毀防空威脅
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁防空威胁

Key.Original: Splintered CSAT AA patrol has taken position in the %1destroyed military installation%2. Eliminate this threat so our aircraft can join the main assault.
Key.Chinese: 分散的廣協同盟防空巡邏隊，正佔據在%1摧毀的軍事設施%2當中。摧毀掉這個威脅，好讓我們的飛機能加入主要突擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 分散的广协防空巡逻队，正占据在%1摧毁的军事设施%2当中。摧毁掉这个威胁，好让我们的飞机能加入主要突击。

Key.Original: ATTACK
Key.Chinese: 攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击

Key.Original: Join the Main Assault
Key.Chinese: 加入主要突擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 加入主要突击

Key.Original: Join our infantry on the %1main airfield%2.
Key.Chinese: 去%1主機場%2加入我方部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去%1主机场%2加入我方部队。

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Wait for the Lift
Key.Chinese: 等待接送
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待接送

Key.Original: After the %2LZ%1 was secured, wait for %3Golf%1 to pick you up.
Key.Chinese: 在%2降落點%1安全之後，請等待%3"Golf"%1來接送你們小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%2降落点%1安全之后，请等待%3"高尔夫"%1来接送你班。

Key.Original: SEIZE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领

Key.Original: Seize the Complex
Key.Chinese: 肅清工廠
Key.Chinesesimp: 占领工厂

Key.Original: Eliminate any enemy threat you come across in the %2factory complex%1. %3Team Echo%1 will join the attack on your command.
Key.Chinese: 肅清在%2工廠%1裡的所有敵人。%3"Echo"小隊%1會等待你的命令，協同你一起肅清。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清在%2工厂%1里的所有敌人。%3"回声"小组%1会等待你的命令，协同你一起肃清。

Key.Original: MOVE
Key.Chinese: 移動
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动

Key.Original: Get to Lakka
Key.Chinese: 前往拉卡
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往拉卡

Key.Original: Make your way to %1Lakka%2 and prepare for the assault.
Key.Chinese: 前往%1拉卡%2，並準備開始突擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%1拉卡%2，并准备开始突击。

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Board the Truck
Key.Chinese: 搭乘卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘卡车

Key.Original: Get in the truck. It will take you to %1Lakka%2.
Key.Chinese: 進入卡車。它會載你去%1拉卡%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入卡车。它会载你去%1拉卡%2。

Key.Original: Wait for your Team
Key.Chinese: 等待你的小隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待你的小组

Key.Original: Your FIA squadmates are on their way. Wait for their truck at our %1FUP%2.
Key.Chinese: 你自由獨立同盟的隊友已經在來的路上了。請在我們的%1進攻出發位置%2等待他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的自由独立同盟队友已经在来的路上了。请在我们的%1攻击出发点%2等待他们。

Key.Original: Securing LZ
Key.Chinese: 肅清降落點
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清降落点

Key.Original: Combined Assault
Key.Chinese: 聯合攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 合成突击

Key.Original: Echo 1 - move in
Key.Chinese: "Echo-1"-開始進發
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声-1"-开始进发

Key.Original: FUP
Key.Chinese: 進攻出發位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击出发点

Key.Original: Factory Complex
Key.Chinese: 工廠
Key.Chinesesimp: 工厂

Key.Original: Ammo Storage
Key.Chinese: 彈藥儲存點
Key.Chinesesimp: 弹药储存点

Key.Original: Disobeyed orders
Key.Chinese: 違抗命令
Key.Chinesesimp: 违抗命令

Key.Original: The whole assault had to be postponed because of your pointless wandering around.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊計劃被迫推遲，都是因為你在四處閒晃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击计划被迫推迟，都是因为你在四处闲晃。

Key.Original: Our assault on the airbase is in progress. Although you've lost your transport and are unable to join our push, you've fulfilled your objectives, secured our rear, and made sure the rest of our air support is safe. Thanks to you, we won't fail this time.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在對空軍基地突擊中。儘管你已經失去交通工具以至於無法加入突擊，但你仍成功完成數個目標，確認我軍後方的安全，並確保其餘的空中支援是安全的。感謝有你，我們這次不可能會輸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在对空军基地发起突击。尽管你已经失去交通工具以至于无法加入突击，但你仍成功完成数个目标，确认我军后方的安全，并确保其余的空中支援是安全的。感谢有你，我们这次不可能会输了。

Key.Original: Our first attempt to seize the %3main airport%2 failed.%1However, after repelling an enemy counterattack, our forces are rallying for a decisive second assault. Meanwhile, recon reports that CSAT forces have pulled back from the front lines. It's unlikely we'll encounter anything other than AAF resistance.%1Your callsign's Nomad. You've proven yourself to be a trusted contact with the FIA, and an effective presence on the battlefield. You'll lead a small group of guerrillas in support of our three-stage main assault.%1Stage One: Our artillery will target the main CSAT armored defense in the %3airbase%2, securing the path for our assault force.%1Stage Two: Teams %4Nomad%2 and %5Echo%2 will eliminate any threat at a %6factory complex%2 near %7Lakka%2. The AAF garrison there consists of infantry and some APCs. It could strike at our forces from the rear and must be neutralized. The %8military installation%2 overlooking the %6complex%2 was hit by our artillery at 0430 and UAVs did not confirm any remaining enemy presence.%1Stage Three: When the factory complex is clear, teams %5Echo%2 and %4Nomad%2 will join the main assault on the %3airport%2.
Key.Chinese: 我們第一次肅清%3主機場%2的任務失敗了。%1然而，在我們成功抵禦了敵人的反攻之後，我們的部隊終於又集結了力量，準備進行第二次嘗試。同時，偵察報告指出廣協同盟已經從前線撤走了。看來目前我們只會遇到阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的抵抗。%1你小隊的呼號是"游牧民"。你已經證明了你是跟自由獨立同盟聯絡的一個很好的橋樑，也證明了你在戰場上的價值。你將帶領一支反抗軍小隊，協助我們進行三階段的突擊計劃。%1第一階段:我們的火炮將會對%3空軍基地%2裡的廣協同盟裝甲部隊進行壓制，為我們的主要突擊部隊清出一條路。%1第二階段:%4"游牧民"%2小隊和%5"Echo"%2將會肅清%7拉卡%2附近的%6工廠%2。那裡有一些阿爾蒂斯武裝力量守軍與裝甲運兵車。他們可能會造成我軍後方的危脅，所以必須殲滅之。俯瞰著%6工廠%2的%8軍事設施%2，在04:30的時候已經被我們的火炮給摧毀，而空中無人載具的報告指出那裡目前已經沒有殘餘的敵人了。%1第三階段:當工廠安全了後，%5"Echo"%2與%4"游牧民"%2小隊將會加入主要突擊，協助我們攻擊%3機場%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们第一次肃清%3主机场%2的任务失败了。%1然而，在我们成功抵御了敌人的反攻之后，我们的部队终于又集结了力量，准备进行决定性的第二次尝试。同时，侦察报告指出广协已经从前线撤走了。看来目前我们只会遇到AAF的抵抗。%1你小队的呼号是"游牧民"。你已经证明了你是跟自由独立同盟联络的一个很好的桥梁，也证明了你在战场上的价值。你将带领一支反抗军小队，协助我们进行三阶段的突击计划。%1第一阶段:我们的火炮将会对%3空军基地%2里的广协装甲部队进行压制，为我们的主要突击部队清出一条路。%1第二阶段:%4"游牧民"%2小队和%5"回声"%2将会肃清%7拉卡%2附近的%6工厂%2。那里有一些AAF守军与装甲运兵车。他们可能会造成我军后方的危胁，所以必须歼灭之。俯瞰着%6工厂%2的%8军事设施%2在04:30时已被我火炮摧毁，而无人机报告指出那里目前已经没有残余的敌人了。%1第三阶段:当工厂安全了后，%5"回声"%2与%4"游牧民"%2小队将会加入主要突击，协助我们攻击%3机场%2。

Key.Original: %2Nomad%1 - Your team.%3%4Echo%1 - Armored team reinforcing your assault on the %6factory complex%1.%3%5Golf%1 - Your airlift. It will provide transport to the %7airbase%1.%3Crossroads - Command.
Key.Chinese: %2"游牧民"%1-你的小隊。%3%4"Echo"%1-裝甲小隊，支援你突擊%6工廠%1。%3%5"Golf"%1-你的空中運輸。它會載你去%7空軍基地%1。%3"交叉路"-指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"游牧民"%1-你的小队。%3%4"回声"%1-装甲小队，支援你突击%6工厂%1。%3%5"高尔夫"%1-你的空中运输。它会载你去%7空军基地%1。%3"交叉路口"-指挥官。

Key.Original: Take command of a small FIA force and support the main assault by eliminating any potential threat at a nearby %1factory complex%2.
Key.Chinese: 指揮一小支自由獨立同盟部隊，掃清附近%1工廠%2中的潛在威脅，好讓我們的主要突擊能成功。
Key.Chinesesimp: 指挥一小支自由独立同盟部队，扫清附近%1工厂%2中的潜在威胁，好让我们的主要突击能成功。

Key.Original: %2Link up with the rest of your team%1%3Travel to %7Lakka%8%1%4Clear the %9factory complex%8 in cooperation with team %12Echo%8%1%5Secure the %10LZ%8%1%6Travel to the %11airbase%8 and join our assault
Key.Chinese: %2與你剩下的隊員會合%1%3前往%7拉卡%8%1%4與%12"Echo"%8一同肅清%9工廠%8%1%5肅清%10降落點%8%1%6前往%11空軍基地%8並加入主要突擊
Key.Chinesesimp: %2与你剩下的队员会合%1%3前往%7拉卡%8%1%4与%12"回声"%8一同肃清%9工厂%8%1%5肃清%10降落点%8%1%6前往%11空军基地%8并加入主要突击

Container.name: x01_Support_Lost
Container.situation: contact lost with team echo

Key.Original: Team Nomad, be advised. We've lost contact with Echo-1. It's up to you now. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"小隊，請注意。我們已經與"Echo-1"失去聯繫。現在只能靠你們自己了。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"小组，请注意。我们已经与"回声-1"失去联系。现在只能靠你们自己了。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_Securing_LZ
Container.situation: golf 2-2 gives kerry some hints on securing the lz

Key.Original: Nomad, before I pick you up, make sure the LZ is secure.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，在我去接你們之前，請確保降落點是安全的。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，在我去接你们之前，请确保降落点是安全的。

Key.Original: The guys here have eyes on the barracks east of the factory, there may still be a Greenback garrison there.
Key.Chinese: 我們這裡有觀察到你們工廠的東邊有一個軍營，那邊還有一些綠軍在活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们这里有人观察到你们工厂的东边有一个军营，那边可能还有一些绿军在活动。

Key.Original: Clear the area, assemble at the LZ and I'll take you to your new FUP. Golf-2-2 out.
Key.Chinese: 肅清該區，並在降落點集合，我會載你們去新的進攻出發位置。"Golf-2-2"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清该区，并在降落点集合，我会载你们去新的进攻出发位置。"高尔夫-2-2"通话完毕。

Container.name: i01_Combined_Assault
Container.situation: echo 1 lead gives kerry some hints on combined assault

Key.Original: Nomad, we're waiting on your signal.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們正在等待你的信號。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们正在等待你的信号。

Key.Original: Don't go rushing in on your own. Our job is to clear the way. You can take care of any infantry in the complex.
Key.Chinese: 不要自己衝進去。我們的工作室負責幫你們清出一條路。你只要擔心工廠裡的敵兵就好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要自己冲进去。帮你们清出一条路是我们的活儿。你只要担心工厂里的敌兵就好了。

Key.Original: If you see any AT troops in the area, make them your primary targets.
Key.Chinese: 假如你等下有看見任何的反坦克單位，請優先處理掉他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你如果发现有反坦克单位，请优先处理掉他们。

Key.Original: Once we seize the factory, we'll divert to the airbase. See you there. Echo-1 out.
Key.Chinese: 一但我們肅清完工廠，我們就會直接前往空軍基地。等下那裡見。"Echo-1"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们肃清完工厂之后就会直接前往空军基地。等下那里见。"回声-1"通话完毕。

Container.name: 47_Tremors2
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Member;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: earthquake during the assault

Key.Original: Uh, that's a negative, Charlie-2-2. No further information at this time. Continue the operation. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 呵，不是，"Charlie-2-2"。現在還暫時不知道發生了什麼事情。請繼續任務。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呵，不是，"查理-2-2"。现在还暂时不知道发生了什么事情。请继续任务。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Felt like a goddamn earthquake.
Key.Chinese: 感覺好像是一場天殺的地震。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感觉好像是一场天杀的地震。

Key.Original: Crossroads, was that us? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，那是我們搞的嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，那是我们搞的吗?完毕。

Container.name: 45_Tremors
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Member;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: earthquake during the assault

Key.Original: ...The fuck was that?
Key.Chinese: ...他媽的搞啥?
Key.Chinesesimp: ...他妈的搞啥?

Container.name: 43_AA_Aside
Container.situation: kerry reports point texas secured

Key.Original: Well, we couldn't have picked a better spot to watch the show...
Key.Chinese: 恩，看來我們找不到更好的地方來觀看這場表演了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，看来我们找不到更好的地方来观看这场表演了...

Container.name: 40_AA_Neutralized
Container.situation: kerry reports point texas secured

Key.Original: Outstanding, Nomad. India, you're clear for takeoff.
Key.Chinese: 幹的棒極了，"游牧民"。"印第安"，你已經可以安全起飛了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的棒极了，"游牧民"。"印第安"，你已经可以安全起飞了。

Key.Original: Nomad, stand by for further orders. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，請等待更進一步的命令。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，请等待更进一步的命令。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Nomad-1 to Crossroads, AA threat neutralized, over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民-1"呼叫"交叉路"，防空威脅已殲滅，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民-1"呼叫"交叉路口"，防空威胁已歼灭，完毕。

Container.name: 35_Lift_Going_Down
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract B;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: airlift under fire

Key.Original: Golf-2-2 to Crossroads - we're under fire - Golf-2-2 sustaining heavy fire from ...
Key.Chinese: "Golf-2-2"呼叫"交叉路"-我們正遭受攻擊-"Golf-2-2"正承受猛烈的攻擊，他們在...
Key.Chinesesimp: "高尔夫-2-2"呼叫"交叉路口"-我们正遭受攻击-"高尔夫-2-2"正承受猛烈的攻击，他们在...

Key.Original: Golf-2-2, come in! ... Golf-2-2, respond!
Key.Chinese: "Golf-2-2"，說話!..."Golf-2-2"，請回答!

Key.Original: No, no, no - fuck!
Key.Chinese: 不，不，不-幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，不，不-干!

Key.Original: Goddammit, we hit that position hard! They must've just moved in.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，我們明明已經炸毀那裡了!他們一定才剛剛抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，我们明明已经把那儿轰平了!他们一定才刚刚抵达。

Key.Original: Nomad, we can't deploy air support with an active AA threat so close to the airbase.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們不能在防空火力如此接近機場的狀況下，派出我們的空中支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们不能在防空火力如此接近机场的状况下派出空中支援。

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Nomad. Golf-2-2's down. AA fire from point Texas, over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"游牧民"。"Golf-2-2"墜毀了。防空火力是從德克薩斯點傳來，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"游牧民"。"高尔夫-2-2"坠毁了。防空火力是从德克萨斯点打过来的，完毕。

Key.Original: You need to secure that position. Good luck. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 你們必須肅清那個位置。祝好運。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们必须肃清那个位置。祝好运。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_LZ_Secured
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: kerry requests airlift

Key.Original: Copy that. ETA 2 mikes. Golf-2-2 out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。預計2分鐘後抵達。"Golf-2-2"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。预计2分钟后抵达。"高尔夫-2-2"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Nomad to Golf-2-2, LZ secure. You're clear to move in, over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"呼叫"Golf-2-2"，降落點已肅清。你可以安全的進來了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"呼叫"高尔夫-2-2"，降落点已肃清。你可以安全的进来了，完毕。

Container.name: 25_Complex_Seized
Container.situation: kerry reports the factory seized

Key.Original: Roger that, Nomad. Good work, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"游牧民"。幹的好，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"游牧民"。干的好，先生们。

Key.Original: Crossroads to all units. Move to Stage Three, I say again, Stage three is a go. Out.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致所有單位。開始第三階段，我重複一遍，第三階段開始了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致所有单位。开始第三阶段，我重复一遍，第三阶段开始了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Nomad to Crossroads, objective secure, over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"致"交叉路"，目標已肅清，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"致"交叉路口"，目标已肃清，完毕。

Key.Original: Okay, let's get to the LZ.
Key.Chinese: 好，讓我們去降落點吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，让我们去降落点吧。

Container.name: 20_Support_Attacking
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract A;
Container.situation: team echo 1 joins the fight

Key.Original: Copy that, Nomad. We're rolling. Echo 1 out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"游牧民"。我們在路上了。"Echo-1"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"游牧民"。我们在路上了。"回声-1"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Nomad to Echo-1, move in, I say again, move in, over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"呼叫"Echo-1"，開始攻擊，我重複一遍，開始攻擊，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"呼叫"回声-1"，开始攻击，我重复一遍，开始攻击，完毕。

Container.name: 15_Support_Ready
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: fill the description here

Key.Original: Echo-1 to Crossroads, we're in position, over.
Key.Chinese: "Echo-1"致"交叉路"，我們就定位了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "回声-1"致"交叉路口"，我们就位了，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Echo-1.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Echo"-1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"回声"-1。

Key.Original: Crossroads to teams Echo-1 and Nomad, proceed with Stage Two, out.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致"Echo-1"與"游牧民"小隊，開始第二階段，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致"回声-1"与"游牧民"，开始第二阶段，通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_Lift_Overhead
Container.situation: kerry's lift is flying overhead

Key.Original: That's Golf-2-2, our ride. It'll wait for us at that OP.
Key.Chinese: 那是"Golf-2-2"，等下負責接送我們的。它會在那個等待點等我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是"高尔夫-2-2"，等下负责接送我们的。它会在那个观察哨等我们。

Container.name: 05_Hello
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry briefs his team on the way to their objective

Key.Original: Good to see you, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 真高興見到你，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真高兴见到你，克里。

Key.Original: C'mon, don't tell us we're on our own again. Can't the almighty Crossroads help us out this time?
Key.Chinese: 拜託，別又跟我說我們這次又得靠自己了吧。難道全能的"交叉路"不能幫一點小忙嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托，别又跟我说我们这次又得靠自己了吧。难道全能的"交叉路口"不能帮一点小忙吗?

Key.Original: A fine morning, gentlemen.
Key.Chinese: 早上好，先生們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 早上好，先生们。

Key.Original: About goddamn time.
Key.Chinese: 真是天殺的好消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是天杀的好消息。

Key.Original: Okay, just so we're all on the same page, here's the plan.
Key.Chinese: 好的，讓我在跟大家說明一次任務計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，现在大家都跟上了，我再说一遍计划。

Key.Original: This operation has three stages. We're at Stage One: shelling enemy armor. Ground units will move in shortly.
Key.Chinese: 這次行動總共分成三個階段。我們現在正在第一階段:對敵人的裝甲部隊進行火炮攻擊。地面部隊將在不久之後開始進軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这次行动总共分成三个阶段。我们现在正在第一阶段:对敌人的装甲部队进行火炮攻击。地面部队将在不久之后开始开进。

Key.Original: Stage Two is where we come in. We need to deal with any potential threat at the factory complex near Lakka.
Key.Chinese: 第二階段就換我們表現了。我們必須處理拉卡附近工廠裡的潛在威脅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第二阶段就换我们表现了。我们必须处理拉卡附近工厂里的潜在威胁。

Key.Original: As a matter of fact, he did: we've got a couple of APC's on standby, callsign Echo-1. They're waiting for the signal to move in.
Key.Chinese: 事實上，是有的:我們有兩輛裝甲運兵車在待命中，呼號是"Echo-1"。他們會等待信號並一起攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实上，是有的:我们有几辆装甲运兵车在待命中，呼号是"回声-1"。他们收到信号就跟我们一起上。

Key.Original: Right. So - once the factory is secure - we move to Stage Three. We'll get an airlift to the base and link up with the main assault.
Key.Chinese: 恩。所以-當工廠安全之後-我們就會開始第三階段。我們會有空中運輸在我們到機場，並加入主要突擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩。所以-当工厂安全之后-我们就会开始第三阶段。我们会有空中运输把我们投送到机场，并加入主要突击。

Key.Original: Any questions? ... Good.
Key.Chinese: 有任何問題嗎?...很好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何问题吗?...很好。

Container.name: 03_Stage_1
Container.situation: hq moves the operation to stage 1.

Key.Original: Crossroads to all units. Stage One is a go, I say again, Stage One is a go. Godspeed. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致所有單位。開始第一階段，我重複一遍，開始第一階段。祝好運。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致所有单位。开始第一阶段，我重复一遍，开始第一阶段。祝好运。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Holy shit!
Key.Chinese: 我的天哪!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪!

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.situation: kerry is looking at the fup with a nato soldier

Key.Original: Uh, I dunno. Could be. Second time's the charm, right?
Key.Chinese: 呵，我不知道。可能吧。第二次總是最重要的，對吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 呵，我不知道。可能吧。老话不是说不管干什么，干两回总能干成嘛。

Key.Original: Where's our armored support, though?
Key.Chinese: 話說我們的裝甲支援在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 话说我们的装甲支援在哪?

Key.Original: Hey, Kerry, if we can't take the airfield now, we're done here, right?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，克里，假如我們這次無法奪回機場，我們在這裡就玩完了，對嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，克里，假如我们这次无法夺回机场，我们在这里就玩完了，对吗?

Key.Original: Sure. A cakewalk. ... Okay, man, that's my ride. Keep your head down.
Key.Chinese: 恩。小菜一碟....好的，老兄，我的車到了。保持安全啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 行吧。小菜一碟....好的，老兄，我的车到了。保持安全啊。

Key.Original: There is none. We gotta seize the harbor near the runway first.
Key.Chinese: 應該如此。但我們得先肅清跑道附近的港口。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不存在的。我们得先肃清跑道附近的港口。

Key.Original: Don't worry - we've got their heavy hardware marked for the artillery - should be a cakewalk.
Key.Chinese: 別擔心-這次我們的火炮會先處理掉大多數的威脅-這次應該是小菜一碟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别担心-这次我们的火炮会先处理掉大多数的威胁-这次应该是小菜一碟。

Key.Original: Moral Fiber
Key.Chinese: 道德素養
Key.Chinesesimp: 道德素养

Key.Original: Having seized control of the main airport, NATO are poised to strike Pyrgos, the capital city of Altis.
Key.Chinese: 在取得主機場的控制權後，北約準備向阿爾蒂斯的首都皮爾戈斯發動突擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在取得主机场的控制权后，北约准备向阿尔蒂斯的首都皮尔戈斯发动突击。

Key.Original: Secure Warehouses
Key.Chinese: 肅清倉庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清仓库

Key.Original: Wait for Reinforcements
Key.Chinese: 等待援軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待援军

Key.Original: Secure Enemy Position
Key.Chinese: 肅清敵人位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清敌人位置

Key.Original: Meet Leader
Key.Chinese: 與班長碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 与班长碰面

Key.Original: Help Squad
Key.Chinese: 幫助友軍步兵班
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助友军步兵班

Key.Original: Follow
Key.Chinese: 跟隨
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟随

Key.Original: Defend Vehicles
Key.Chinese: 防禦我方載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御我方载具

Key.Original: Board Vehicle
Key.Chinese: 搭乘載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘载具

Key.Original: Await Orders
Key.Chinese: 等待更進一步的命令
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待更进一步的命令

Key.Original: Neutralize Tank
Key.Chinese: 殲滅敵軍坦克
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭敌军坦克

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: MEET
Key.Chinese: 碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面

Key.Original: HELP
Key.Chinese: 幫助
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助

Key.Original: FOLLOW
Key.Chinese: 跟隨
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟随

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 防禦
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: NEUTRALIZE
Key.Chinese: 殲滅
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭

Key.Original: Secure the warehouse complex on the east flank of our attack.
Key.Chinese: 肅清我方攻勢東翼的倉庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清我方攻势东翼的仓库。

Key.Original: Await reinforcements and ensure the LZ is secure.
Key.Chinese: 等待援軍，並確保降落點是安全的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待援军，并确保降落点是安全的。

Key.Original: Eliminate all enemy presence in this area.
Key.Chinese: 肅清該區的所有敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清该区的所有敌人。

Key.Original: Meet Charlie-2-3's CO at this position.
Key.Chinese: 與"Charlie-2-3"的班長見面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"查理-2-3"的指挥官见面。

Key.Original: Move along the highway and assist Charlie-2-3, who are pinned down at the city's main entrance.
Key.Chinese: 沿著公路前往"Charlie-2-3"的位置，他們被壓制在城鎮的主要入口處，請協助他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沿着公路前往"查理-2-3"的位置，他们被压制在城镇的主要入口处，请协助他们。

Key.Original: Follow your team leader in order to meet the officer in command.
Key.Chinese: 跟隨你的小隊長，他會帶你去見現場的指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟随你的组长，他会带你去见现场的指挥官。

Key.Original: Defend the vehicles from the ambush.
Key.Chinese: 我們被埋伏了，請守住我們的載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们被埋伏了，请守住我们的车辆。

Key.Original: Get in the convoy vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 進入車隊裡的載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入车队里的车辆。

Key.Original: Wait for orders.
Key.Chinese: 等待更進一步的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待更进一步的命令。

Key.Original: Take your team and neutralize enemy anti-armor defenses at point Xray.
Key.Chinese: 帶著你的小隊去殲滅敵方在愛克斯光點的反裝甲防禦工事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带着你的小队去歼灭敌方在爱克斯光点的反装甲防御工事。

Key.Original: Artillery Strike
Key.Chinese: 火炮轟炸
Key.Chinesesimp: 炮火打击

Key.Original: Yankee
Key.Chinese: Yankee
Key.Chinesesimp: 扬基

Key.Original: Xray
Key.Chinese: X-Ray
Key.Chinesesimp: 爱克斯光

Key.Original: Gamma
Key.Chinese: 伽馬
Key.Chinesesimp: 伽马

Key.Original: Situation
Key.Chinese: 現在的狀況
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在的状况

Key.Original: Plan
Key.Chinese: 現在的任務計劃
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在的任务计划

Key.Original: Neutralize Tank
Key.Chinese: 殲滅敵方坦克
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭敌方坦克

Key.Original: Having secured our eastern flank and supported a friendly squad, our forces were able to seize the capital and its surrounding fortifications. With enemy forces successfully cut in half - and the seat of political power under our control - it's a turning point in this conflict.
Key.Chinese: 由於你們成功肅清我方攻勢東翼的威脅，並協助我軍步兵班，我們的部隊現在可以開始肅清首都及其四周的防禦工事。敵方的部隊已經被我們切割成兩半-而他們政權的象徵也被我們控制住了-這場戰役無疑是整個行動的轉捩點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由于你们成功肃清我方攻势东翼的威胁，并协助我军步兵班，我们的部队现在可以开始肃清首都及其四周的防御工事。敌方的部队已经被我们切割成两半-而他们政权的象征也被我们控制住了-这场战役无疑是整个行动的转折点。

Key.Original: You were unable to neutralize enemy armor before friendlies sustained heavy casualties.
Key.Chinese: 你來不及殲滅敵方坦克，這讓我們的友軍傷亡慘重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你来不及歼灭敌方坦克，这让我们的友军伤亡惨重。

Key.Original: You did not follow your orders.
Key.Chinese: 你並沒有服從命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你并没有服从命令。

Key.Original: With the help of the FIA, we were able to seize the main airport.%1%1We've been handed a major strategic advantage in this invasion, but we cannot give the AAF any time to breathe. Plus, with CSAT consolidating their forces in the north, we've managed to regroup and push deeper into enemy-controlled territory with little resistance.%1%1Now, we're poised to strike at Pyrgos: the capital city of Altis and their last true base of power. However, with one of the largest AAF bases nearby, it's a heavily fortified target. We'll launch a coordinated assault, securing both the base and the city.%1%1Cutting any remaining forces in two, we'll isolate our enemy in the north and south-west. Keep in mind: taking this objective will represent a significant blow to the Altis regime, and could help bring about a swift end to this conflict.
Key.Chinese: 在自由獨立同盟的幫助下，我們成功的奪得了主機場。%1%1我們已經在整個入侵行動中取得重大的優勢，但我們不能讓阿爾蒂斯武裝力量有喘息的機會。此外，由於廣協同盟退守到北部半島，這讓我們有機會重整隊伍，並持續推進深入到敵軍的領土上，在整個推進過程中，敵軍少有抵抗。%1%1現在，我們準備要對皮爾戈斯發動攻擊:該城市是阿爾蒂斯的首都，也是其政權權力的最後象徵。然而，該城的旁邊有一個阿爾蒂斯武裝力量最大的基地，它的守備森嚴。我們將會發動協同攻擊，同時對基地與首都展開突擊。%1%1任務成功的話，我們將能把敵人殘餘的部隊切割成兩半，把他們各自獨立在北方與西南方。請記住:奪下這個目標，對阿爾蒂斯的政權來說會是一次重重的打擊，並且有可能會提前讓戰爭結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在自由独立同盟的帮助下，我们成功的夺得了主机场。%1%1我们已经在整个入侵行动中取得重大的优势，但我们不能让AAF有喘息的机会。此外，由于广协退守到北部半岛，这让我们有机会重整队伍，并毫不费力地推进深入到敌军的领土上。%1%1现在，我们准备要对皮尔戈斯发动攻击:该城市是阿尔蒂斯的首都，也是其政权权力的最后象征。然而，该城的旁边有一个AAF最大的基地，它的守备森严。我们将会发动协同攻击，同时对基地与首都展开突击。%1%1任务成功的话，我们将能把敌人残余的部队切割成两半，把他们各自独立在北方与西南方。请记住:夺下这个目标，对阿尔蒂斯的政权来说会是一次沉重打击，并且有可能会让冲突更快结束。

Key.Original: %3Nomad-2%2 - You%1%3Bravo-2-3%2 - Your team%1Crossroads - Head Quarters%1%4Serpent%2 - Convoy%1Charlie-2-3 - Support Infantry
Key.Chinese: %3"游牧民"-2%2-你%1%3"Bravo"-2-3%2-你的小隊%1"交叉路"-指揮官%1%4"海蛇"%2-車隊%1"Charlie-2-3"-支援步兵班

Key.Original: Link up with the convoy and secure our %3east flank%2. Holding that position will give us the upper hand when engaging the AAF base.
Key.Chinese: 與車隊會合，並前往%3東翼%2進行肅清任務。奪下那個位置，可以幫助我們在攻擊阿爾蒂斯武裝力量基地時取得優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与车队会合，并前往%3东翼%2进行肃清任务。夺下那个位置，可以帮助我们在攻击AAF基地时取得优势。

Container.name: 130_visualOnTank
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Leader;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: kerry has direct visual contact on enemy tank, and is informed that he can call artillery support if needed

Key.Original: Nomad, be advised, we've got artillery on standby. If needed, call it in. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，請注意，我們已經有火炮在待命中。假如有需要，你可以呼叫它。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，请注意，我们已经有火炮在待命中。假如有需要，你可以呼叫它。完毕。

Key.Original: Your call Nomad. Over.
Key.Chinese: 由你決定，"游牧民"。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由你决定，"游牧民"。完毕。

Key.Original: Sir, I've made visual contact with the tank, how copy?
Key.Chinese: 長官，我已經發現到坦克了，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，我看到敌方坦克了，收到没有?

Key.Original: Understood. We need it neutralized. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 了解。我們必須殲滅掉它。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。我们必须歼灭掉它。请稍等。

Key.Original: Copy that. But what about the FIA? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。但我們要如何跟自由獨立同盟交代?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。但我们要如何跟自由独立同盟交代?完毕。

Container.name: x10_pyrgosBombardmentAgain
Container.situation: kerry chooses to use artillery strike to neutralize the tank, nikos and the fia are not happy about it

Key.Original: Listen, Nikos, I had no other choice.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，尼科斯，我沒有選擇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，尼科斯，我没有选择。

Key.Original: Kerry this is Nikos. Why have you started shelling Pyrgos again?
Key.Chinese: 克里，這裡是尼科斯。為什麼你又開始炮擊皮爾戈斯了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，这里是尼科斯。为什么你又开始炮击皮尔戈斯了?

Key.Original: This is how you repay us after we helped you, American?
Key.Chinese: 在我們幫助你那麼多後，這就是你回報我們的方式嗎，美國佬?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们帮你那么多，你就这么报答我们吗，美国佬?

Key.Original: To hell with you.
Key.Chinese: 幹你媽的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去死吧。

Container.name: x05_boardVehiclePunishment
Container.situation: kerry does not board the vehicle and is punished

Key.Original: What the fuck, Kerry?
Key.Chinese: 你他媽的在幹什麼，克里?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈的在干什么，克里?

Container.name: x00_boardVehicleWarning
Container.situation: kerry is taking too long to board the vehicle

Key.Original: What the hell, Kerry? Board the vehicle! We need to move. Now!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼，克里?快上車!我們必須走了。快!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼，克里?快上车!我们必须走了。快!

Container.name: i10_tank
Container.situation: squad leader gives some suggestions to kerry on how to neutralize enemy tank

Key.Original: Kerry, you've got options here.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你這裡有一些選擇方案。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你有多种选择方案。

Key.Original: You can try to take out the tank yourself, but it's highly discouraged in this situation.
Key.Chinese: 你可以試著自己摸掉坦克，但這個難度會非常高。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以试着自己摸掉坦克，但这个形势下我强烈建议别这么干。

Key.Original: You should have some satchels. Place them near the rear of the tank and detonate from a safe distance.
Key.Chinese: 你身上應該有幾顆炸藥。你可以把它們放置在坦克的後方，並在安全距離引爆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你身上应该有几颗炸药。你可以把它们放置在坦克的后方，并在安全距离引爆。

Key.Original: You could also send your AT to engage it.
Key.Chinese: 你也可以派你的反坦克兵去解決它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你也可以派你的反坦克兵去解决它。

Key.Original: If you're able to spot the tank from a safe distance, you can call an artillery strike using support.
Key.Chinese: 假如你能在安全距離發現坦克，你也可以呼叫火炮轟炸來摧毀它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你能在安全距离发现坦克，你也可以呼叫火炮轰炸来摧毁它。

Key.Original: But shelling the city is not taken fondly by the civilians.
Key.Chinese: 但炮擊城市的舉動會讓該地的平民不喜歡我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但炮击城市的举动会让该地的平民不喜欢我们。

Key.Original: Up to you. Out.
Key.Chinese: 由你來決定。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由你来决定。通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_plan
Container.situation: squad leader how the team will proceed to help friendly squad

Key.Original: Sir, what's our course of action?
Key.Chinese: 長官，現在的任務是什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，现在的任务是什么?

Key.Original: Okay, got it.
Key.Chinese: 好的，了解了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，了解了。

Key.Original: We're moving to assist Charlie-2-3. They're pinned down, have taken casualties, and need our support.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在前往支援"Charlie-2-3"的路上。他們被壓制住了，並已有多名傷亡，他們急需我們的支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在前往支援"查理-2-3"的路上。他们被压制住了，并已有多名伤亡，他们急需我们的支援。

Container.name: i00_situation
Container.situation: squad leader explains kerry about the general mission plan

Key.Original: Sir, so what's the plan here?
Key.Chinese: 長官，所以現在的計劃是?
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，所以现在的计划是?

Key.Original: Pay attention, Kerry, we need to secure the east flank.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，克里，我們必須肅清我們的東翼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，克里，我们必须肃清我们的东翼。

Key.Original: We're moving to Point Yankee; it's a bunch of abandoned warehouses.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在向Yankee點;那邊有一堆的廢棄倉庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在向扬基点;那边有一堆的废弃仓库。

Key.Original: The bombardment's already underway. We're dropping a metric fuck-ton of shit on them.
Key.Chinese: 炮擊已經開始了。我們正在向敵人丟數萬噸的狗屎，讓他們一次吃個夠。
Key.Chinesesimp: 炮击已经开始了。我们正在向敌人丢数万吨的狗屎，让他们一次吃个够。

Container.name: 95_reinforcementsArrived
Container.situation: reinforcements arrive at kerry's team location and hq orders the convoy, with kerry's team, to move in and help the other squad

Key.Original: Bravo-2-3, priority, move in and support Charlie 2-3 ASAP.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo-2-3"，優先目標，請立即移動到"Charlie2-3"的位置並支援他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃-2-3"，优先目标，请立即移动到"查理2-3"的位置并支援他们。

Key.Original: Copy that, we're moving now.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們上路了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们上路了。

Container.name: 90_pinnedSquadHelpHq
Container.situation: hq informs kerry's team that his is sending reinforcements that will guard the flank and tasks them with helping the pinned down friendly squad at the entrance of pyrgos

Key.Original: Bravo-2-3, I'm sending Charlie-2-2 to hold point Yankee.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo-2-3"，我將派遣"Charlie-2-2"去接管Yankee點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃-2-3"，我将派遣"查理-2-2"去接管扬基点。

Key.Original: Once they arrive, move to Charlie-2-3's position and provide support, how copy?
Key.Chinese: 當他們抵達後，你們就移動到"Charlie-2-3"的位置並支援他們，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 当他们抵达后，你们就移动到"查理-2-3"的位置并支援他们，有收到吗?

Key.Original: Understood, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"交叉路"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"交叉路口"。通话完毕。

Container.name: 85_pinnedSquadHelp
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B HQ;EPC B Leader;
Container.situation: the squad tasked with securing the city of pyrgos is ambushed and pinned down by enemy fire, unable to move, they call hq for help

Key.Original: Break, break. Crossroads this is Charlie-2-3.
Key.Chinese: 緊急插入，緊急插入。"交叉路"這裡是"Charlie-2-3"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧急插入，紧急插入。"交叉路口"这里是"查理-2-3"。

Key.Original: We're under heavy fire on the outskirts of Pyrgos. Multiple casualties. We're pinned down!
Key.Chinese: 我們在皮爾戈斯的郊區遭遇到猛烈的火力攻擊。已經承受多名傷亡。我們被壓制住了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在皮尔戈斯的郊区遭遇到猛烈的火力攻击。已经承受多名伤亡。我们被压制住了!

Key.Original: Requesting immediate support at our position! How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: 請求立即支援到我們的位置!有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求立即支援到我们的位置!收到没有?完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Charlie-2-3. Stay put and stay alive.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"Charlie-2-3"。固守原地，堅持下去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"查理-2-3"。固守原地，坚持下去。

Key.Original: We have no Air Support available at this time. Diverting Bravo-2-3 to support you. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們現在沒有可用的空中支援。將派遣"Bravo-2-3"去支援你們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们现在没有可用的空中支援。将派遣"布拉沃-2-3"去支援你们。通话完毕。

Container.name: 80_warehousesSecureHq
Container.situation: squad leader reports to hq about the objective/flank being secure

Key.Original: Roger that, Bravo-2-3. Standby for further orders.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"Bravo-2-3"。請等待更進一步的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"布拉沃-2-3"。请等待更进一步的命令。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Point Yankee's under our control. East flank is secure. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，Yankee點已經被我們給控制住了。東翼已安全。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，扬基点已经被我们给控制住了。东翼已安全。完毕。

Container.name: 75_warehousesSecure
Container.situation: squad leader tells his subordinates that the warehouses complex is secure

Key.Original: Okay, this area looks secure. Spread out. Make sure we didn't miss anything.
Key.Chinese: 好的，看來這區是安全了。散開。確定我們沒有遺漏了些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，看来这区是安全了。散开。确定我们没有遗漏了些什么。

Container.name: 70_anUnexpectedCallHq
Container.situation: squad leader informs hq about the fia report, hq orders artillery to stand down and sends the main force to seize the base

Key.Original: Goddammit. Foxtrot-3, cease artillery fire. Out.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的。"Foxtrot-3"，立即停止炮擊。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的。"狐步舞"-3，立即停止炮击。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, be advised, our fire-missions are striking civilian structures in Pyrgos, how copy?
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，請注意，我們的火炮正在攻擊皮爾戈斯的民房區，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，请注意，我们的火炮正在攻击皮尔戈斯的民用建筑，有收到吗?

Container.name: 65_anUnexpectedCallGroup
Container.situation: kerry reports to his squad leader that nato might be hitting civilian structures while bombing enemy base

Key.Original: Sir, we've got an FIA report that our fire support is targeting Pyrgos.
Key.Chinese: 長官，皮爾戈斯向我報告說我們的火炮正在轟炸皮爾戈斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，自由独立同盟向我报告说我们的火炮正在炮击皮尔戈斯。

Key.Original: There's been a mistake - our guns are shelling the city - ordnance is hitting civilian areas.
Key.Chinese: 他們應該是射錯地方了-我們的大炮正在轟炸城市-彈藥正落在平民區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们应该是打错地方了-我们的大炮正在轰炸城市-弹药正落在平民区。

Key.Original: Say again?
Key.Chinese: 再說一次?
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一次?

Key.Original: Understood. Standby.
Key.Chinese: 了解。稍待。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。稍待。

Container.name: 60_anUnexpectedCallFia
Container.situation: kerry is again contacted on the radio by an fia figure, he is then told by nikos himself that nato bombardment on the enemy base is also hitting civilian structures

Key.Original: It's Kerry here, go ahead.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是克里，請講。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是克里，请讲。

Key.Original: Are you sure? We're engaging Greenback positions near the city, how copy?
Key.Chinese: 你確定嗎?我們正在城市附近與綠軍交戰中，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定吗?我们正在城市附近与绿军交战中，收到没有?

Key.Original: Shit, Kerry, come in! This is Nikos.
Key.Chinese: 該死，克里，接進!這裡是尼科斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，克里，跟我说话!这里是尼科斯。

Key.Original: Uh, copy that, wait one.
Key.Chinese: 呃，收到了，請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，收到了，请稍等。

Key.Original: NATO is shelling Pyrgos. You need to stop it, now!
Key.Chinese: 北約正在炮擊皮爾戈斯。你必須阻止這件事，馬上!
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约正在炮击皮尔戈斯。你必须阻止这件事，马上!

Key.Original: Listen to me: yes, we are certain. NATO is hitting Pyrgos. You must do something!
Key.Chinese: 聽我說:是的，我很確定。北約正在炮擊皮爾戈斯。你必須做點什麼!
Key.Chinesesimp: 听我说:是的，我很确定。北约正在炮击皮尔戈斯。你必须做点什么!

Container.name: 55_anUnexpectedCallReaction
Container.situation: kerry talks to himself, after receiving an unknown radio message

Key.Original: ... Who the hell?

Container.name: 50_anUnexpectedCall
Container.situation: kerry is contacted by an fia member

Key.Original: Kerry, do you read?
Key.Chinese: 克里，你有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你有收到吗?

Container.name: 49_earthQuakeBigGroup
Container.situation: squad leader asks kerry if everything is ok

Key.Original: Everything's fine. Just a bit shaken up, sir. Over.
Key.Chinese: 一切都很好。只是有點晃，長官。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一切都很好。只是有点晃，长官。完毕。

Key.Original: Nomad? Come in. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"?接進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"?请回答。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。通话完毕。

Container.name: 48_earthQuakeBig
Container.situation: kerry talks to himself after feeling the earthquake

Key.Original: Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操!

Key.Original: It's getting stronger!
Key.Chinese: 它越搖越大了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 震得越来越厉害了!

Container.name: 47_earthQuakeSmallGroup
Container.situation: small earth quake happens and squad leader reports to team

Key.Original: Goddammit, not again!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，別又來了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 活见鬼，别又来了!

Key.Original: Listen up! Command reports seismic activity in their AO. Stay sharp.
Key.Chinese: 聽好了!指揮官回報說他們的行動區域有發生地震。保持注意。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听好了!指挥官回报说他们的行动区域有发生地震。保持注意。

Key.Original: So?
Key.Chinese: 所以?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以?

Container.name: 46_earthQuakeSmall
Container.situation: small earth quake happens

Key.Original: Crossroads to all call-signs, be advised, we've just experienced an earthquake.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致所有單位，請注意，我們剛經歷了一場地震。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致所有单位，请注意，我们刚经历了一场地震。

Key.Original: Copy that, Crossroads.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"交叉路"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"交叉路口"。

Container.name: 45_pinnedSquadMoves
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Abstract B;
Container.situation: then, later on, pinned down squad, reports to hq that it is moving to their objective at the city entrance, they later get pinned down by the enemy and will call for help

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Charlie-2-3, we're advancing on Pyrgos. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"Charlie-2-3"，我們正在向皮爾戈斯推進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"查理"-2-3，我们正在向皮尔戈斯推进。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Charlie-2-3.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Charlie-2-3"。

Container.name: 40_attackWarehousesGroup
Container.situation: squad leader gives a last, small briefing on how the team should proceed

Key.Original: Alright, stay low. Keep sharp. We're moving on Yankee now.
Key.Chinese: 好的，姿態壓低。保持警戒。我們開始前往Yankee。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，姿态压低。保持警戒。我们开始向扬基开进。

Key.Original: Let's go!
Key.Chinese: 我們走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走!

Container.name: 35_attackWarehousesConvoy
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Leader;
Container.situation: squad leader orders convoy to stay on the road, move in to the warehouses complex and give cover/support

Key.Original: On it, Bravo-2-3.
Key.Chinese: 知道了，"Bravo-2-3"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了，"布拉沃-2-3"。

Key.Original: Serpent, move to the road - lay down some cover fire!
Key.Chinese: "海蛇"，請繼續沿著道路行駛-並提供我們掩護火力!
Key.Chinesesimp: "海蛇"，请继续沿着道路行驶-并提供我们掩护火力!

Container.name: 30_attackWarehouses
Container.situation: squad leader informs hq that they are going for the objective/warehouses complex

Key.Original: Copy that, Bravo-2-3. Proceed with caution. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Bravo-2-3"。請小心行事。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"布拉沃-2-3"。请小心行事。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, we're moving on our objective, how copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路口"，我們正前往我們的目標當中，有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我们正前往我们的目标当中，收到没有?完毕。

Container.name: 25_ambushClear
Container.situation: the moment when the area is clear of enemies and convoy is safe, squad leader briefs team sbout following attack/recognizance of the warehouses complex, enemy is expected

Key.Original: Okay, form on me! Get set to assault Point Yankee.
Key.Chinese: 好的，跟著我!準備突擊Yankee點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，跟着我!准备突击扬基点。

Container.name: 20_ambushHq
Container.situation: squad leader relays information about enemy contact to hq

Key.Original: Copy that, Bravo 2-3. We need that flank secure. Lock it down and proceed to Yankee. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Bravo2-3"。我們必須確保那邊是安全的。請繼續前往Yankee點並肅清之。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"布拉沃2-3"。我们必须确保那边是安全的。请继续前往扬基点并肃清它。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Bravo-2-3, we've made contact en route to point Yankee.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"Bravo-2-3"，我們在前往Yankee點的路上遭遇敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"布拉沃-2-3"，我们在前往扬基点的路上遭遇敌人。

Key.Original: Possible enemy presence at Yankee, acknowledge!
Key.Chinese: Yankee點可能有敵人在那，收到了嗎!
Key.Chinesesimp: 扬基点可能有敌人，收到了吗!

Container.name: 15_ambushGroup
Container.participants: EPC B Leader;EPC B Player;EPC B Member;
Container.situation: squad leader orders team to leave vehicles and defend the convoy

Key.Original: Ambush, move!
Key.Chinese: 是埋伏，移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 是埋伏，快走!

Key.Original: Shit. Disembark! Protect the vehicles!
Key.Chinese: 該死。下車!保護好我們的載具!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。下车!保护车辆!

Key.Original: Get to cover and return fire!
Key.Chinese: 在四處找掩護並開始回擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 找好掩体，开始还击!

Key.Original: What the hell's going on?!
Key.Chinese: 他媽的到底發生了什麼事情?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的到底发生了什么事情?!

Container.name: 145_areaClear
Container.situation: the enemy is neutralized and the area is deemed secure

Key.Original: Good work, Nomad. Dig in. Hold that position for now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，"游牧民"。現在請先守住該位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，"游牧民"。现在请先守住该位置。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, X-ray's clear. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，X-Ray點已經肅清。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，爱克斯光点已经肃清。完毕。

Container.name: 140_attackEnemy
Container.situation: kerry's team neutralizes the enemy tank and reports to his squad leader that informs kerry about the full out attack on the enemy position by the rest of the friendlies at the cemetery

Key.Original: Sir, enemy tank is neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: 長官，敵軍坦克已殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，敌军坦克已歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Good job, Kerry. Stay put. We're advancing now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，克里。留在原地。我們正在推進了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，克里。留在原地。我们正在推进了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 135_tankStrike
Container.situation: kerry requests fire mission on the enemy tank

Key.Original: Copy that. Artillery strike inbound - clear the blast radius. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。火炮轟炸即將到來-請遠離爆炸半徑。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。火炮轰炸即将到来-请远离爆炸半径。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, requesting a fire mission at the designated coordinates, how copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，請求火炮轟炸在指定的座標，有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，请求火力任务打击指定座标，收到没有?完毕。

Container.name: 125_playerTakesControl
Container.situation: kerry takes control of his team

Key.Original: You heard it guys, on me. Let's move!
Key.Chinese: 你們都聽到了，跟上。我們走吧!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们都听到了，跟上。我们走吧!

Container.name: 120_underFireDiscussionGroup
Container.situation: squad leader orders kerry to take team some team members under his wing and neutralize the tank, could be good opportunity to explain, briefly, how to proceed with the task ahead

Key.Original: Copy that, sir.
Key.Chinese: 收到，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，长官。

Key.Original: Okay, Kerry! Take Ryan, Givens and Taylor.
Key.Chinese: 好的，克里!帶上瑞安，吉文斯和泰勒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，克里!带上瑞安，吉文斯和泰勒。

Key.Original: Try to flank that enemy tank. We'll provide suppressive fire from here.
Key.Chinese: 試著繞過去找到那臺坦克。我們剩下的人會留在這邊做火力壓制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 试着绕过去找到那辆坦克。我们剩下的人会留在这边做火力压制。

Key.Original: Be careful. Don't attract too much attention until that armor is neutralized.
Key.Chinese: 請小心。在那臺裝甲載具被處理掉之前，你最好不要吸引到太多的注意力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请小心。在那辆装甲车辆被处理掉之前，你最好不要吸引到太多的注意力。

Container.name: 115_underFireDiscussion
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Leader;
Container.situation: kerry, his leader and the leader of the pinned squad have a brief discussion under fire, but in cover, and they decide to task kerry to take some men and neutralize enemy tank while the rest attend the wonded and keep suppressing the enemy

Key.Original: We're pinned down and we've got multiple casualties - those fuckers have armor somewhere in the city.
Key.Chinese: 我們被壓制在這裡，並已經有多名傷亡了-那些該死的王八蛋在城市裡有裝甲載具在支援他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们被压制在这里，并已经有多名伤亡了-那些该死的王八蛋在城市里有装甲车辆在支援他们。

Key.Original: It's immobilized, but they're still using it as static defense.
Key.Chinese: 那臺載具已經不能移動了，但他們還是把他當作定點防禦設施。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它已经瘫痪了，但他们还是把他当作定点防御设施。

Key.Original: What's the situation?
Key.Chinese: 現在的狀況怎樣?
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在的状况怎样?

Key.Original: We last spotted it around point X-ray.
Key.Chinese: 我們最後看見它在愛克斯光點的附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们最后看见它在爱克斯光点的附近。

Key.Original: Got it and, hey, thanks for the assist.
Key.Chinese: 知道了，嘿，很感謝你們來支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了，嘿，很感谢你们来支援。

Key.Original: Where is it?
Key.Chinese: 它在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 它在哪?

Key.Original: Okay. Hold this position. We'll try to circle around and neutralize that tank.
Key.Chinese: 好的。你們繼續堅守此地。我們會試著繞過去殲滅掉那臺坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。你们继续坚守此地。我们会试着绕过去歼灭那辆坦克。

Container.name: 110_cemeteryArrivalGroup
Container.situation: leader orders kerry to follow him so they go and meet friendly leader

Key.Original: Everyone, take up a position around the cemetery and for God's sake keep your heads down.
Key.Chinese: 所有人，請在墓地的四周找掩護，還有千萬別把頭給露出來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人，请在墓地的四周找掩护，还有千万别把头给露出来了。

Key.Original: Kerry, form on me.
Key.Chinese: 克里，你跟著我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你跟着我。

Container.name: 10_ambush
Container.situation: convoy becomes aware of an ambush

Key.Original: What the fuck? ... Enemy contact! Vehicle, 12 o'clock! Open up, open up!
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?...接敵!載具，12點鐘方向!開火，開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼?...接敌!车辆，12点钟方向!开火，开火!

Container.name: 105_cemeteryArrival
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Leader;
Container.situation: convoy reaches the friendly squad position

Key.Original: Nomad, we're near the cemetery, your eleven o'clock.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們在墓地的附近，就在你的11點鐘方向。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们在墓地的附近，就在你的11点钟方向。

Key.Original: Copy that, Charlie-2-3, moving in.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Charlie-2-3"，我們在進去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"查理"-2-3，我们在进去了。

Container.name: 103_millerIsAnAssHole
Container.situation: kerry talks to himself about miller

Key.Original: Son of a bitch. Just what the hell are you doing here, Miller?
Key.Chinese: 狗娘養的。你到底在這裡執行什麼天殺的任務，米勒?
Key.Chinesesimp: 狗娘养的。你到底在这里执行什么天杀的任务，米勒?

Container.name: 102_investigationExplained
Container.situation: hq gives more information to kerry about miller and his team

Key.Original: Crossroads to Nomad. Message. If you encounter Captain Miller or one of his teams, you are not authorized to provide assistance. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致"游牧民"。訊息。假如你遇見了上校米勒或是他的隊員，你沒有被授權可以幫助他們。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致"游牧民"。有消息。如果你遇见了米勒上校或是他的小组，不准帮助他们。收到没有?

Key.Original: You will stay the hell away from those Brits and their black ops bullshit, Corporal. Do you understand?
Key.Chinese: 你必須遠離那些天殺的英國人與他們的秘密任務，下士。你了解了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你离那些天杀的英国佬与他们的狗屁秘密行动远点，下士。明白没?

Key.Original: Good. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 很好。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Say again, sir?
Key.Chinese: 請重複一遍，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 请重复一遍，长官?

Key.Original: Uh ... Affirmative, sir.
Key.Chinese: 呵...知道了，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...知道了，长官。

Container.name: 100_reinforcementsArrivedGroup
Container.situation: squad leader orders subordinates to enter the convoy vehicles

Key.Original: Everyone, mount up, we need to move! Let's go!
Key.Chinese: 所有人，上車，我們得走了!出發!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人，上车，我们得走了!出发!

Container.name: 07_investigationClosed
Container.situation: hq personally contacts kerry and informs him that the army investigation on him is now closed

Key.Original: Crossroads to Nomad. Message, over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致"游牧民"。訊息，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致"游牧民"。信息，完毕。

Key.Original: The investigation into the 'Stratis incident' has been closed.
Key.Chinese: 軍方對'斯特拉蒂斯事件'的調查已經結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 军方对'斯特拉蒂斯事件'的调查已经结束了。

Key.Original: NATO MEDCOM has finally confirmed the identity of Captain Miller. Over.
Key.Chinese: 北約的地中海通信系統終於確認了上校米勒的身分。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约的地中海司令部终于确认了米勒上校的身份。完毕。

Key.Original: Uh, go ahead, Crossroads.
Key.Chinese: 恩，請說，"交叉路"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 恩，请说，"交叉路口"。

Key.Original: Listen, Nomad, the details go way beyond your pay grade. Suffice to say, command wants you to remain on active duty.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，"游牧民"，這個細節已經不是你的階級所能知道的。我只是想跟你說，指揮官希望你能繼續留下來執行任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，"游牧民"，以你的阶级根本无权得知这事的细节。我只能跟你说，指挥部希望你能继续留下来执行任务。

Key.Original: Confirmed? Confirmed as what, sir?
Key.Chinese: 確認?所以他的身份是，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认了?那他的身份是什么，长官?

Container.name: 05_boardVehicles
Container.situation: squad leader orders kerry and other team members to board the convoy vehicles

Key.Original: Time to move!
Key.Chinese: 是時候該走了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 是时候该走了!

Key.Original: Alright, everyone, load up!
Key.Chinese: 好的，大夥，上車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，大伙，上车!

Container.name: 00_intro
Container.situation: hq communicates to all teams that artillery is being fired on the enemy base and all call-signs should move into their designated positions

Key.Original: All elements, be advised, artillery engaging priority targets in the vicinity of Point Gamma.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，請注意，我軍火炮正在攻擊伽馬點附近的優先目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 各分队都有，请注意，我军火炮正在攻击伽马点附近的优先目标。

Key.Original: Move to your designated objectives and standby. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請前往各自的目標並待命。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请前往各自的目标并待命。通话完毕。

Key.Original:
1. Wait for orders
2. Move and secure the east flank by holding %3Point Yankee%2
Key.Chinese:
1. 等待命令
2. 前往東翼%3Yankee點%2並肅清該區
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 等待命令
2. 前往东翼%3扬基点%2并肃清该区

Key.Original: Preventive Diplomacy
Key.Chinese: 預防性外交
Key.Chinesesimp: 预防性外交

Key.Original: NATO launches a final push against remaining AAF positions.
Key.Chinese: 北約對阿爾蒂斯武裝力量剩餘的據點開始發動進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约对AAF剩余的据点开始发动进攻。

Key.Original: Board Vehicle (Opt)
Key.Chinese: 搭乘載具(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘载具(支线任务)

Key.Original: Secure Gamma
Key.Chinese: 肅清伽馬
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清伽马

Key.Original: Regroup forces
Key.Chinese: 與小隊會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与小队会合

Key.Original: Defend Kalochori
Key.Chinese: 防禦卡洛霍里
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御卡洛霍里

Key.Original: Secure Kalochori
Key.Chinese: 肅清卡洛霍里
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清卡洛霍里

Key.Original: BOARD
Key.Chinese: 搭乘
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: DEFEND
Key.Chinese: 防禦
Key.Chinesesimp: 防御

Key.Original: SECURE
Key.Chinese: 肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清

Key.Original: Board the friendly AMV and be transported to a safe defense position.
Key.Chinese: 搭乘友軍裝甲戰鬥車，它會把你載到適合安全防守的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘友军装甲战斗车，它会把你载到适合安全防守的位置。

Key.Original: Attack and secure the Solar Station.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊並肅清太陽能發電站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击并肃清太阳能发电站。

Key.Original: Regroup with friendly ground forces.
Key.Chinese: 與友軍小隊會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与友军小队会合。

Key.Original: Make sure the enemy does not take Kalochori back.
Key.Chinese: 確保敵人不會奪回卡洛霍里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确保敌人不会夺回卡洛霍里。

Key.Original: Attack Kalochori and seize the area.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊並肅清卡洛霍里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击并肃清卡洛霍里。

Key.Original: Kappa
Key.Chinese: 卡帕
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡帕

Key.Original: Gamma
Key.Chinese: 伽馬
Key.Chinesesimp: 伽马

Key.Original: UAV
Key.Chinese: 空中無人載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人机

Key.Original: Snipers
Key.Chinese: 狙擊手
Key.Chinesesimp: 狙击手

Key.Original: Nearby Friendlies
Key.Chinese: 附近的友軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 附近的友军

Key.Original: Enemy IFV
Key.Chinese: 敵軍步兵戰車
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军步兵战车

Key.Original: You were able to seize Kalochori and its surrounding area.
