With the main airport, the capital, and the north east now under our control, NATO forces are on the verge of neutralizing the AAF presence on Altis. With any luck, we can put a stop to this flashpoint before it escalates beyond control.
Key.Chinese: 你成功控制了卡洛霍里與其周邊地區。隨著主機場，首都與東北區域在我們的控制之中，北約部隊距離殲滅阿爾蒂斯上剩下的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量已經不遠了。如果運氣好的話，我們就可以在這場戰爭還沒鬧到更大之前就把它給結束掉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功控制了卡洛霍里与其周边地区。随着主机场，首都与东北区域在我们的控制之中，北约部队距离歼灭阿尔蒂斯上剩下的AAF已经不远了。如果运气好的话，我们就可以在这场战争还没闹到更大之前就把它给结束掉。

Key.Original: You were unable to defend Kalochori from the enemy counter attack, forcing us to pull back. Losing the momentum will make this invasion difficult to complete.
Key.Chinese: 你無法在敵人的反攻之中守住卡洛霍里，這導致我們得撤回原點。失去攻擊勢頭將會讓我們的入侵行動更難完成。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你无法在敌人的反攻之中守住卡洛霍里，这导致我们得撤回原点。失去攻击势头将会让我们的入侵行动更难完成。

Key.Original: Having taken control of the capital, Pyrgos, our offensive in the east continues.%1%1We need to kick on, using our momentum to seize the initiative. Now, although weakened, enemy forces still occupy important locations in the north and south east of Altis. So, before they have the chance to organize and fortify these positions, we need to strike on both fronts.%1%1In addition to a swift operation in the south, we'll launch a combined arms assault on Kalochori. Securing this town - alongside the solar power station - will put us in a strong position to push further into enemy-controlled territory. Time is of the essence here.%1%1For now, CSAT forces seem to be under orders not to interdict our operations; they've once again pulled back. Command is trying to work out what exactly's going on. We need to bring an end to this conflict before the global situation escalates beyond our control.
Key.Chinese: 在我們奪得首都皮爾戈斯後，我們開始向東邊挺進。%1%1我們需要保持住這股勢頭，利用它來讓我們取得主動權。現在，儘管敵人的實力已被削弱，但他們還是佔據著阿爾蒂斯北面與東南面的重要據點。所以，我們必須趕在他們能夠重新組織並鞏固這些點之前，就把這些點給拿下，我們必須同時開啟兩條戰線。%1%1南面的行動已經如火如荼的展開，而我們北面的部隊必須對卡洛霍里執行一場多兵種聯合作戰。藉由佔領這個城市以及它旁邊的太陽能發電站，將可使我們擁有一個穩固的據點，繼續向敵人的領土堆進。時間是關鍵。%1%1現在看來，廣協同盟部隊好像被命令不要妨礙到我們的行動;他們又再一次向後撤了。指揮官正試圖釐清到底是發生了什麼事情。我們必須在全球的緊張局勢升級到無法控制住的狀況之前，就快速的把這場戰爭給結束掉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们夺得首都皮尔戈斯后，我们开始向东边挺进。%1%1我们需要保持住这股势头，利用它来让我们取得主动权。现在，尽管敌人的实力已被削弱，但他们还是占据着阿尔蒂斯北面与东南面的重要据点。所以，我们必须赶在他们能够重新组织并巩固这些点之前，就把这些点给拿下，我们必须同时开启两条战线。%1%1南面的行动已经如火如荼的展开，而我们北面的部队必须对卡洛霍里执行一场多兵种联合作战。借由占领这个城市以及它旁边的太阳能发电站，将可使我们拥有一个稳固的据点，继续向敌人的领土堆进。时间是关键。%1%1现在看来，广协部队好像被命令不要妨碍到我们的行动;他们又再一次向后撤了。指挥官正试图理清到底是发生了什么事情。我们必须在全球的紧张局势升级到无法控制住的状况之前，就快速的把这场战争给结束掉。

Key.Original: %3Nomad%2 - Your team%1Crossroads - Head Quarters%1%4Delta-3-4%2 - Support APC%1%5Charlie-2-3%2 - Support Infantry%1Eagle - Ground attack fighters%1%3Golf-2-1%2 - Insertion chopper
Key.Chinese: %3"游牧民"%2-你的小隊%1"交叉路"-指揮官%1%4"Delta-3-4"%2-支援的裝甲運兵車%1%5"Charlie-2-3"%2-支援的步兵%1"鷹"-對地攻擊機%1%3"Golf-2-1"%2-突入用直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: %3"游牧民"%2-你的小组%1"交叉路口"-指挥官%1%4"德尔塔-3-4"%2-支援的装甲运兵车%1%5"查理-2-3"%2-支援的步兵%1"鹰"-对地攻击机%1%3"高尔夫-2-1"%2-突入用直升机

Key.Original: Seize the enemy-controlled solar power station, designated %3Gamma%2, and the nearby town of Kalochori, designated %4Kappa%2.
Key.Chinese: 肅清編號為%3伽馬%2的太陽能發電站，和編號是%4卡帕%2的卡洛霍里城市。
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清编号为%3伽马%2的太阳能发电站，和编号是%4卡帕%2的卡洛霍里城市。

Container.name: x40_overrun
Container.situation: kalochori is overrun by the enemy

Key.Original: All teams, abort! Fall back from Kalochori now. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，取消任務!現在立刻從卡洛霍里撤離。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小队，取消任务!现在立刻从卡洛霍里撤离。通话完毕。

Container.name: x35_transportEnemy
Container.situation: support apc detects enemy vehicle very close and orders kerry's team to disembark

Key.Original: Everyone out! Move it!
Key.Chinese: 所有人快下車!快!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人快下车!快!

Key.Original: Nomad, dismount! Enemy vehicle ahead.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，下車!敵軍載具距離我們很近。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，下车!敌军车辆就在正前方。

Container.name: x30_transportCanceled
Container.situation: support apc moves to defense position without kerry's team, he took too long

Key.Original: Shit. Understood, Delta-3-4.
Key.Chinese: 該死。了解了，"Delta-3-4"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。了解了，"德尔塔-3-4"。

Key.Original: Nomad, I can't wait any longer. Moving out. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們不能一直待在這邊。我們要移動了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们不能一直待在这边。我们要移动了。完毕。

Container.name: x25_transportFailed
Container.situation: support apc takes too long (ai pathfinding) to reach destination while kerry's team is on board of it

Key.Original: Copy that, Delta-3-4.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Delta-3-4"。

Key.Original: Nomad, sorry, but we've got to drop you here. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，抱歉，我們就只能載你們到這了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，抱歉，我们就只能载你们到这了。完毕。

Container.name: x20_transportSucceeded
Container.situation: support apc reaches destination successfully, with kerry's team inside

Key.Original: Copy that, Delta-3-4, thanks.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Delta-3-4"，很感謝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"德尔塔-3-4"，很感谢。

Key.Original: Nomad, in position at the defensive line. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們已經到達防線了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们已经到达防线了。完毕。

Container.name: x15_transportMoving
Container.situation: support apc starts moving with kerry's team inside

Key.Original: Copy that, Delta-3-4.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Delta-3-4"。

Key.Original: Nomad, we're moving out. Hold on to something. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，我們開始移動了。請稍等一下。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，我们开始移动了。请稍等一下。完毕。

Container.name: x10_transportDestroyedHq
Container.situation: support apc is destroyed

Key.Original: Goddammit, keep fighting Nomad! Push forward! Out.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，"游牧民"請繼續戰鬥!向前推進!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，"游牧民"继续战斗!向前推进!通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Delta-3-4's down! I say again, Delta-3-4 is down. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，"Delta-3-4"已經被摧毀了!我重複一遍，"Delta-3-4"已經被摧毀了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，"德尔塔-3-4"已经被摧毁了!我重复一遍，"德尔塔-3-4"已经被摧毁了。完毕。

Container.name: x05_transportDestroyed
Container.situation: support apc is destroyed, kerry talks to himself

Key.Original: Holy shit!
Key.Chinese: 天啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊!

Container.name: x00_vehicleStolen
Container.situation: kerry's team enters enemy armoured vehicle and he reports to friendly units

Key.Original: All teams, be advised, Nomad's handling the enemy Gorgon at Kappa. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有小队，请注意，"游牧民"正在处理那台在卡帕内的"蛇发女妖"装甲车。通话完毕。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小队，请注意，"游牧民"正在处理那台在卡帕内的"蛇发女妖"装甲车。通话完毕。

Container.name: i15_enemyVehicle
Container.situation: hq reports enemy armoured vehicle in kalochori

Key.Original: Proceed with caution. We've got reports of enemy alpha victors in your AO. Over.
Key.Chinese: 請謹慎行事。有報告指出該區有敵人的裝甲載具。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请谨慎行事。有报告指出该区有敌人的装甲车辆。完毕。

Key.Original: Intel suggests IFVs. Use the drone at your disposal. Recon the area before you advance.
Key.Chinese: 應該是步兵戰車。空中無人載具任由你使用。你可以先偵察該去，再決定肅清方針。
Key.Chinesesimp: 应该是步兵战车。你可以随意使用无人机。推进之前先侦察好那片区域。

Key.Original: Crossroads, we're inbound to Kappa. Any advice? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我們正在前往卡帕中。有任何建議嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我们正在前往卡帕中。有任何建议吗?完毕。

Key.Original: You can go in directly, but remember, you've got artillery on station. Laser targeting with a drone might be the safest way to proceed.
Key.Chinese: 你也可以直接進去，但請記住，你現在有火炮支援在待命中。你可以使用空中無人載具的雷射來為炮兵進行引導作業，這可能比較安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你也可以直接进去，但请记住，你现在有火炮支援在待命中。你可以用无人机来为炮兵进行激光制导，这可能是最安全的方式。

Key.Original: What kind of threat? Over.
Key.Chinese: 是什麼樣的威脅?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是什么样的威胁?完毕。

Key.Original: Up to you, Nomad. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 由你決定，"游牧民"。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由你决定，"游牧民"。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Container.name: i10_snipers
Container.situation: hq let's kerry know that earlier, enemy snipers were neutralized while on top of the solar towers, and that their weapons may be useful

Key.Original: Nomad, be advise, enemy marksmen were neutralized at the solar complex.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，請注意，敵軍的狙擊手已在太陽能發電站中被殲滅。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，请注意，敌军的精确射手已在太阳能发电站中被歼灭。

Key.Original: If you're in a pinch, their weapons may come in useful. It's imperative we sustain the momentum. Out.
Key.Chinese: 假如你有需要，你可以使用他們的武器來為你贏得優勢。在這場戰鬥之中我們必須盡一切的可能來維持住攻勢。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你有需要，你可以使用他们的武器来为你赢得优势。在这场战斗之中我们必须尽一切的可能来维持住攻势。通话完毕。

Container.name: i05_uav
Container.situation: hq explains how uav can be used in this operation

Key.Original: Affirmative, Nomad. Put it to good use. Remember, combining artillery with the UAV will give you the upper hand in this operation.
Key.Chinese: 是的，"游牧民"。請好好使用它。請記住，使用空中無人載具為你的火炮進行觀測，將可為你占得先機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，"游牧民"。请好好使用它。请记住，把无人机和火炮结合使用，将可为你占得先机。

Key.Original: Do not waste this opportunity. Out.
Key.Chinese: 不要浪費這個機會了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要浪费这个机会了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, interrogative, we got a drone at our disposal? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我有疑問，我們是否有一臺空中無人載具可供我們使用?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我有疑问，我们是否有一台无人机可供我们使用?完毕。

Container.name: i00_friendlies
Container.situation: hq informs ground troops to be careful when engaging, because other teams are close by

Key.Original: All teams, be advised!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，請注意!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小队，请注意!

Key.Original: Confirm your targets, you've got friendlies operating in your AO! Out.
Key.Chinese: 開火前請先確認目標，請勿誤擊在同個行動區域內的友軍!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开火前请先确认目标，你的行动区域内有友军!通话完毕。

Container.name: 50_reinforcementsNeutralized
Container.situation: enemy reinforcements are neutralized

Key.Original: Outstanding work, Nomad. Rally up with the rest of the troops near Kappa. Out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的棒極了，"游牧民"。請與其他的部隊在卡帕附近會合。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的棒极了，"游牧民"。请与其他的部队在卡帕附近会合。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, we've beaten back the enemy offensive.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我們擊敗了敵人的進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我们击败了敌人的进攻。

Container.name: 48_transport
Container.situation: friendly ifv lets kerry knows he can transport his team to the other side of the city, protected

Key.Original: Copy that, Delta-3-4, thanks.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"Delta-3-4"，很感謝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"德尔塔-3-4"，很感谢。

Key.Original: Nomad, this is Delta-3-4. If you like, we can take you through the city. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，這裡是"Delta-3-4"。假如你有需要的話，我們可以帶你們穿過城市。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，这里是"德尔塔-3-4"。假如你有需要的话，我们可以带你们穿过城市。完毕。

Container.name: 46_kalichoriDefend
Container.situation: hq informs kerry about incoming enemy counter attack

Key.Original: Nomad, you've got enemy reinforcements approaching Kappa - inbound from the north east.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，敵人的援軍正在靠近卡帕中-正從東北方靠近。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，敌人的援军正在靠近卡帕中-正从东北方靠近。

Key.Original: You need to halt their offensive. Artillery and CAS is on standby when you need it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 你們必須擋住他們的進攻。火炮支援與密接空中支援都已經準備好，你有需要的話就可以呼叫。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们必须挡住他们的进攻。火炮支援与近距离空中支援都已经准备好，你有需要的话就可以呼叫。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"交叉路"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"交叉路口"。通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_kalichoriSecure
Container.situation: city of kalochori is deemed secure

Key.Original: Good work, Nomad. Stand by.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，"游牧民"。請待命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，"游牧民"。请待命。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Kappa is secure. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，卡帕安全了。有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，卡帕安全了。有收到吗?完毕。

Container.name: 43_earthQuakeReport
Container.situation: brief discussion between hq and kerry about the earth quake

Key.Original: Crossroads to Nomad, status report. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致"游牧民"，狀況回報。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致"游牧民"，汇报状况。完毕。

Key.Original: We don't know - MEDCOM's got no idea what's causing it - according to seismic monitoring, this is abnormal activity.
Key.Chinese: 我們不知道-地中海通信系統並不知道是什麼原因導致地震發生的-根據地震監測，這種現象極為不正常。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不知道-地中海司令部并不知道是什么原因导致地震发生的-根据地震监测，这地震活动很异常。

Key.Original: I'm fine. Any more surprises?
Key.Chinese: 我沒事。還有什麼驚喜嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没事。还有什么惊喜吗?

Key.Original: This was the strongest one yet. If it carries on like this, we'll have no island to fight for. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這次又比上次大了。假如它這樣繼續變大下去，遲早我們就會沒有島嶼可以供我們打仗了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到现在这次震得最厉害。要是地震再这么闹下去，迟早就没有岛给我们争了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 42_earthQuake
Container.situation: kerry reacts to earth quake

Key.Original: What the literal fuck..?
Key.Chinese: 他媽的又來了..?
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的又来了..?

Container.name: 40_rallyPoint
Container.situation: ground troops rally up and start moving towards kalochori

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Out.
Key.Chinese: 知道了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 知道了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Okay, let's move out!
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們開始移動!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们开始移动!

Key.Original: Crossroads, proceeding to Kappa. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我們開始向卡帕進軍了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我们开始向卡帕进军了。完毕。

Container.name: 35_solarPowerSecure
Container.situation: ground troops secure the power plant

Key.Original: Copy that. Nomad, Charlie-2-3, dig in at Gamma. Set up a defensive perimeter. Hold that position.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"游牧民"。"Charlie-2-3"，請留守伽馬。建立防守範圍。堅守該位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"游牧民"。"查理-2-3"，请留守伽马。建立防御圈。坚守该位置。

Key.Original: Delta-3-4, Nomad, rally up and get set to push north east. Out.
Key.Chinese: "Delta-3-4"，"游牧民"，你們集合完成後就準備開始向東北推進。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔-3-4"，"游牧民"，你们集合完成后就准备开始向东北推进。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Gamma is secure, how copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，伽馬肅清完成，有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，伽马肃清完成，有收到吗?完毕。

Container.name: 30_teamsReport
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;EPC B Leader;EPC B Member;
Container.situation: kerry's team, infantry support and amv support report their actions

Key.Original: Copy that, Nomad.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"游牧民"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"游牧民"。

Key.Original: Delta-3-4, Charlie-2-3, SITREP. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Delta"-3-4，"Charlie-2-3"，狀況回報。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔"-3-4，"查理"-2-3，状况回报。完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Nomad's deployed. Engaging Gamma. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，"游牧民"部署完成。開始肅清伽馬。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，"游牧民"部署完成。开始肃清伽马。完毕。

Key.Original: Charlie-2-3, hold your ground. Nomad, Delta-3-4, support Charlie-2-3 and seize that position. Out.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie-2-3"，守住你們的位置。"游牧民"，"Delta-3-4"，去支援"Charlie-2-3"並肅清該位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理-2-3"，守住你们的位置。"游牧民"，"德尔塔-3-4"，去支援"查理"-2-3并肃清该位置。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Delta-3-4, en route to Gamma. Ready to support. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"Delta-3-4"，在前往伽馬的路上。準備好開始支援。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"德尔塔-3-4"，在前往伽马的路上。准备好开始支援。完毕。

Key.Original: Charlie-2-3 here. We're engaging Gamma but coming under heavy fire. Unable to proceed. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie-2-3"在這。我們正在伽馬點交戰了，但是敵人火力猛烈。無法推進。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理-2-3"在这。我们正在伽马点交战了，但是敌人火力猛烈。无法推进。完毕。

Container.name: 25_flyOut
Container.situation: insertion pilot informs he is leaving lz after dropping kerry's squad

Key.Original: Troops on the ground! Moving out.
Key.Chinese: 部隊在地面了!撤離中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 部队投送到地面了!该出发了。

Container.name: 20_flyInTouchDownGroup
Container.situation: kerry orders his team to disembark

Key.Original: Everyone, out of the chopper, go!
Key.Chinese: 所有人，全部給我下機，走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有人，下直升机，上!

Container.name: 15_flyInTouchDown
Container.situation: insertion pilot informs squad that the chopper has landed and it is safe to disembark

Key.Original: Touch down! Go, go, go!
Key.Chinese: 著陸!走，走，走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 着陆!快，快，快!

Container.name: 12_doorGunnerEngages
Container.situation: insertion chopper detects enemy when landing

Key.Original: Contact, left flank! Free to engage!
Key.Chinese: 接敵，左翼!自由開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌，左翼!自由开火!

Container.name: 10_flyInGroup
Container.situation: kerry briefs his team about the landing

Key.Original: Okay, listen up. The LZ's hot. Once we're on the ground, get set for contact.
Key.Chinese: 好的，聽好了。降落點很危險。一旦我們著陸，請立刻準備好交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，听好了。降落点很危险。一旦我们着陆，请立刻准备好交战。

Container.name: 05_flyInEvent
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Player;EPC B Abstract A;
Container.situation: jet team reports they have neutralized enemy aa at the power plant, but lz is still hot

Key.Original: Crossroads, this is Eagle, enemy anti-air at Gamma neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，這裡是"鷹"，敵軍在伽馬的防空武力已被殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，这里是"鹰"，敌军在伽马的防空武力已被歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Eagle, RTB.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鷹"，請返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鹰"，返回基地。

Key.Original: Golf-2-1, you're clear for landing. LZ is hot.
Key.Chinese: "Golf-2-1"，你已經可以著陸了。降落點很危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: "高尔夫-2-1"，你已经可以着陆了。降落点很危险。

Key.Original: Nomad, get boots on the ground. Push towards the solar station. Secure that position. Over.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，你們下機以後。就開始向太陽能發電站進軍。肅清那個位置。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，你们下机以后。就开始向太阳能发电站进攻。肃清那个位置。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Crossroads. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"交叉路"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"交叉路口"。通话完毕。

Container.name: 00_flyIn
Container.situation: insertion pilot warns kerry squad to be ready for landing

Key.Original: Nomad, get set for landing. Sixty seconds.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，請準備好著陸。60秒。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，请准备好着陆。60秒。

Key.Original:
1. Move and secure %3Gamma%2
2. %4Regroup%2 with ground forces
3. Seize %5Kappa%2
Key.Chinese:
1. 突入並肅清%3伽馬%2
2. 與友軍小隊%4會合%2
3. 肅清%5卡帕%2
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 突入并肃清%3伽马%2
2. 与友军小队%4会合%2
3. 肃清%5卡帕%2

Key.Original: Artillery is now out of ammo
Key.Chinese: 火炮彈藥已用完
Key.Chinesesimp: 火炮弹药已用完

Key.Original: Paradise Found
Key.Chinese: 人間天堂
Key.Chinesesimp: 人间天堂

Key.Original: Backed into a corner, AAF remnants consolidate for a last-ditch counterattack.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量剩餘的部隊被逼迫到了角落，他們準備做最後的反抗。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF剩余的部队被逼迫到了角落，他们准备做最后一搏。

Key.Original: Scouting
Key.Chinese: 偵察
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察

Key.Original: With %1Paros%2 and %3Kalochori%4 secured, the AAF are in full retreat, forced north to %5Ioannina%6.%7They're in a pinch - maybe looking to buy some time - and intel believes they're regrouping in preparation for a last-ditch counterattack. Command is likely to issue the order to push north within the next few hours.%8Last we heard, negotiations with CSAT have been proceeding unimpeded, though it's unclear exactly how successful they're proving to be. For now, CSAT forces are officially no longer actively participating in AAF operations.
Key.Chinese: 在%1帕羅斯%2與%3卡洛霍里%4被我們奪下來後，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量剩餘的部隊開始進行全面撤退，退守至%5伊奧安尼納%6。%7雖然那邊的部隊不是很多，不過他們有可能只是想拖延一點時間，好讓其他的部隊可以來得及整合，做最後的大反攻。為了不給他們這個機會，指揮官很有可能會在幾小時候就發布向北推進的命令。%8根據我們最後所聽到的情報，我們與廣協同盟的談判已逐漸順利，雖然我們也不知道上頭的長官是如何去做協商的。不過至少確定的是，廣協同盟部隊已經不會再幫忙阿爾蒂斯武裝力量部隊了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1帕罗斯%2与%3卡洛霍里%4被我们夺下来后，AAF剩余的部队开始进行全面撤退，退守至%5伊奥安尼纳%6。%7虽然那边的部队不是很多，不过他们有可能只是想拖延一点时间，好让其他的部队可以来得及整合，做最后的大反攻。为了不给他们这个机会，指挥部很有可能会在几小时候就发布向北推进的命令。%8根据我们最后所听到的情报，我们与广协的谈判非常顺利，虽然我们也不知道上头协商得多成功就是了。不过至少确定的是，广协部队已经不会再积极参与AAF的行动了。

Key.Original: Meet with Crossroads
Key.Chinese: 與"交叉路"會面
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"交叉路口"会面

Key.Original: MEET
Key.Chinese: 會面
Key.Chinesesimp: 会面

Key.Original: Crossroads needs to speak to you. Rendezvous with him.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"想要跟你說幾句話。去與他會面。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"想要跟你说几句话。去与他会面。

Key.Original: Regroup with NATO
Key.Chinese: 與北約會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 与北约会合

Key.Original: REGROUP
Key.Chinese: 會合
Key.Chinesesimp: 会合

Key.Original: Regroup with NATO forces stationed %1north of Paros%2.
Key.Chinese: 去%1帕羅斯的北邊%2並與北約部隊會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去%1帕罗斯的北边%2并与北约部队会合。

Key.Original: Find Miller
Key.Chinese: 找到米勒
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到米勒

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻

Key.Original: Once you have the truck, deliver it to %1Miller%2.
Key.Chinese: 等你拿到卡車後，把它開去給%1米勒%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等你拿到卡车后，把它送给%1米勒%2。

Key.Original: Steal the Truck
Key.Chinese: 偷卡車
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷卡车

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻

Key.Original: Lieutenant James claims Miller needs a truck stored somewhere in %1the nearby base%2. Find and deliver it to him.
Key.Chinese: 根據上尉詹姆斯的情報，米勒好像想要一臺卡車，而卡車被停放在%1基地的附近%2。找到卡車並交給米勒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据詹姆斯上尉的情报，米勒好像想要一台卡车，而卡车被停放在%1基地的附近%2。找到卡车并交给米勒。

Key.Original: Destroy Retreating Forces
Key.Chinese: 摧毀撤退中的部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁撤退中的部队

Key.Original: DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 摧毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁

Key.Original: The AAF are consolidating at %1Ioannina%2. Use %3Delta 3%4 and %5Golf 4-1%6 to soften them up before sending in %7Echo 2%8.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量正固守在%1伊奧安尼納%2。先使用%3"Delta"3%4與%5"Golf4-1"%6來削弱他們的實力，再派遣%7"Echo"2%8來掃蕩他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF正固守在%1伊奥安尼纳%2。先使用%3"德尔塔"3%4与%5"高尔夫4-1"%6来削弱他们的实力，再派遣%7"回声"2%8来扫荡他们。

Key.Original: Find James
Key.Chinese: 找到詹姆斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到詹姆斯

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜尋
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻

Container.name: x05_James_Bypassed
Container.situation: kerry gets in the truck carrying the device before meeting james.

Key.Original: Kerry... Is that you? ...
Key.Chinese: 克里...是你嗎?...
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里...是你吗?...

Key.Original: Do you think you... Made enough noise, Kerry? ...
Key.Chinese: 你不覺得你...噪音有點弄得太多了，克里?...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不觉得你...动静弄得太大了，克里?...

Key.Original: Take it to Miller... Ruins... Two-Zero-Zero... Two-Zero-Zero...
Lieutenant! Yeah, it's me. I'm in this... Actually, I don't know what the hell it is. A truck carrying something.
Key.Chinese: 上尉!是，是我。我在這臺...事實上，我不知道這是啥鬼東西。這臺卡車好像載著些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉!是，是我。我在这辆...事实上，我也不知道这是辆啥鬼东西。反正是一辆不知道载着什么东西的卡车。

Key.Original: Forget about that... Kerry... I'm done for...
Key.Chinese: 忘了我吧...克里...我已經差不多了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 算了吧...克里...我已经完蛋了...

Key.Original: No, not before I come pick you up.
Key.Chinese: 不，在我接到你之前我哪也不會去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，你不会完蛋的，我马上来接你。

Key.Original: Lieutenant? ... Goddammit.
Key.Chinese: 上尉?...天殺的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉?...天杀的。

Container.name: x03_Plane_Destroyed
Container.situation: the airplane is shot down.

Key.Original: Kerry, be advised, we've lost comms with Golf-4-1. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 克里，請注意，我們與"Golf-4-1"失去聯繫。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，请注意，我们与"高尔夫-4-1"失去联系。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_Out_Of_Ammo
Container.situation: kerry fails to soften enemy forces before the artillery runs out of ammo.

Key.Original: That's it from Delta-3. All units, move in!
Key.Chinese: "Delta-3"彈藥用完。所有單位，開始推進!
Key.Chinesesimp: "德尔塔-3"都砸光了。所有单位，开始推进!

Container.name: i01_Scouting
Container.situation: hq gives kerry tips on how to scout.

Key.Original: Stay alert out there, Kerry. Echo hit them hard, but don't be surprised if you run into some stragglers.
Key.Chinese: 在那邊請隨時保持警戒，克里。"Echo"已經重重打擊過他們了，但當你遇到些散兵時請不要太驚訝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在那边请随时保持警戒，克里。"回声"已经重重打击过他们了，但你要是遇到散兵游勇也别太意外。

Key.Original: Pay close attention to the hills. They might be doing some recon of their own.
Key.Chinese: 請密切注意那個山。他們可能有人在那山上做偵察。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请密切注意那些小山头。他们可能有人在那山上做侦察。

Key.Original: Avoid contact as much as possible. Get to the OP and call out fire missions for Delta. Out.
Key.Chinese: 請盡量避免交戰。移動到偵察點並呼叫"Delta"進行火炮轟炸。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请尽量避免交战。移动到观察哨并呼叫"德尔塔"执行火力任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 85_The_End_Of_All_Things
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Member;EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: nato forces collapse under csat's offensive as miller walks away and credits roll.

Key.Original: This is Echo-2-1, confirmed! We're trying to p-
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"Echo-2-1"，了解!我們正試圖-
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"回声-2-1"，了解!我们正试图-

Key.Original: Crossroads, we're under heavy assault! We can't-
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，我們正遭受到猛烈攻擊!我們無法-
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，我们正遭受到猛烈攻击!我们无法-

Key.Original: All units! Multiple hostile aircraft inbound!
Key.Chinese: 所有單位!多名敵方飛機靠近中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位!多架敌方飞机正在接近!

Key.Original: Copy, 4-1!
Mayday! Mayday! Golf-4-1 going down!
Key.Chinese: 求救!求救!"Golf-4-1"正在墜落!
Key.Chinesesimp: 求救!求救!"高尔夫-4-1"正在坠落!

Key.Original: 1-1, say again! Over!
Key.Chinese: "1-1"，請再說一次!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "1-1"，请再说一次!完毕!

Key.Original: All units! All units! Tactical withdrawal! I say again, get your guys out-
Key.Chinese: 所有單位!所有單位!戰術撤退!我重複一遍，讓你們的人撤-
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位!所有单位!战术撤退!我重复一遍，让你们的人撤-

Container.name: 80_Return
Container.situation: miller decides to help kerry.

Key.Original: I'll tell you what.
Key.Chinese: 我會告訴你為什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我跟你说。

Key.Original: I like you, Kerry. I'll be back in an hour. If you're still here, I'll give you a way out.
Key.Chinese: 我喜歡你，克里。我會在一個小時候回來。如果你還在這裡，我會給你一條出去的路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我喜欢你，克里。我会在一个小时候回来。如果你还在这里，我会给你一条出去的路。

Key.Original: Things are about to get ugly. I'd suggest you keep your head down.
Key.Chinese: 局勢將會變得很惡劣。我建議你最好低調點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 局势将会闹得很难看。我建议你最好低调点。

Container.name: 75_CSAT_Inbound
Container.situation: csat begin their attack due to kerry's actions.

Key.Original: All units, we've got multiple unknown contacts approaching the northern coast.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，我們有多名未知目標從北海岸靠近中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，我们有多名未知目标从北海岸靠近中。

Key.Original: Standby. We might have a problem here.
Key.Chinese: 請待命。我們可能有麻煩了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请待命。我们可能有麻烦了。

Container.name: 70_Miller
Container.situation: kerry meets with miller. miller tells him what has been going on.

Key.Original: Miller.
Key.Chinese: 米勒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒。

Key.Original: Old habits die hard.
Key.Chinese: 舊習難改。
Key.Chinesesimp: 旧习难改。

Key.Original: Not so fast. I think you owe me some answers.
Key.Chinese: 不要那麼急。我認為你還欠我一些答案。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别那么急。我认为你还欠我一些答案。

Key.Original: Ah, Kerry. You certainly do have the tendency to show up unexpectedly.
Key.Chinese: 啊，克里。你肯定是有喜歡神出鬼沒的癖好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，克里。你肯定是有喜欢神出鬼没的癖好。

Key.Original: This is what it's all been about, isn't it? Stratis, Mike-26, the airport, everything.
Key.Chinese: 這臺就是你所有任務的目的，是嗎?斯特拉蒂斯，Mike-26，機場，所有的事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这玩意就是你所有任务的目的，是吗?斯特拉蒂斯，Mike-26雷达站，机场，所有的事。

Key.Original: Hm. Well, I'll take it from here.
Key.Chinese: 哼。那麼，它從這裡就開始交給我吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哼。那么，我就在这接手这台车了。

Key.Original: You sabotaged the invasion.
Key.Chinese: 你破壞了入侵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你破坏了入侵。

Key.Original: You'd do well to refrain from threatening me.
Key.Chinese: 你最好不要這樣威脅我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你最好别这么威胁我。

Key.Original: For what? To find this? What is it?
Key.Chinese: 為了什麼?是要找到這個?這是什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 为了什么?为了找到这个?这是什么?

Key.Original: Fuck you it is!
Key.Chinese: 幹你的王八蛋!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操你的王八蛋!

Key.Original: We needed more time.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要更多的時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要更多的时间。

Key.Original: What? No - Miller - that's not good enough, I -
Key.Chinese: 什麼?不-米勒-這還不夠，我-
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么?不-米勒-这还不够，我-

Key.Original: That's classified.
Key.Chinese: 那是機密。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是机密。

Key.Original: Kerry, I swear, once more and I'll drop you where you stand.
Key.Chinese: 克里，我發誓，你再這樣罵一次我就把你給打趴在原地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，我发誓，你再这样骂一次我马上把你就地打翻。

Key.Original: Think about it. When was the last time this region experienced tremors like these? There's been at least a dozen in the last few days alone.
Key.Chinese: 你試著想想。這個地區哪個時候有像這樣的地震活動?過去幾天少說也搖個幾十次了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你试着想想。这个地区什么时候有过像这样的地震活动?光是过去几天少说也摇个几十次了。

Key.Original: Question time's over.
Key.Chinese: 問題時間結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 提问时间结束。

Container.name: 65_In_Truck
Container.situation: kerry realizes that whatever it is, it's important.

Key.Original: Jesus Christ. What is this thing?
Key.Chinese: 天啊。這到底是啥鬼東西?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊。这到底是啥鬼东西?

Container.name: 60_Truck_Found
Container.situation: kerry spots the truck carrying the device.

Key.Original: That's got to be it.
Key.Chinese: 應該就是這臺了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 应该就是这车了。

Container.name: 55_Hang_Up
Container.situation: kerry cuts off crossroads.

Key.Original: That's enough of that.
Key.Chinese: 這樣就安靜多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样就安静多了。

Container.name: 50_NATO_Angered
Container.situation: crossroads notices kerry is missing.

Key.Original: Just what in the hell is taking so long?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的你到底要花多少時間?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的你到底干什么要这么久?

Key.Original: Kerry, are you there? Resp-
Key.Chinese: 克里，你在嗎?請回-
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，你在吗?请回-

Container.name: 45_Danger
Container.situation: kerry approaches the research base.

Key.Original: What have I gotten myself into?
Key.Chinese: 為什麼我要讓自己陷入這種麻煩事?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我这是惹上什么事了?

Container.name: 40_James_Dead
Container.situation: kerry reacts to james dying.

Key.Original: Lieutenant? Lieutenant? Fuck!
Key.Chinese: 上尉?上尉?幹!
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉?上尉?操!

Container.name: 35_The_Device
Container.situation: james tells kerry what he has to do.

Key.Original: Kerry ... There's not much time...
Key.Chinese: 克里...我沒有多少時間了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里...我没有多少时间了...

Key.Original: Shut the fuck up ... Listen, Kerry!
Key.Chinese: 你先給我閉嘴...聽著，克里!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你先特么闭嘴...听好，克里!

Key.Original: In the base ... There's something... A... A truck...
Key.Chinese: 在那個基地...裡面有某個東西...一臺...一臺卡車...
Key.Chinesesimp: 在那个基地...里面有个东西...一辆...一辆卡车...

Key.Original: Fuck, man! What happened? What is this place?
Key.Chinese: 幹，老兄!發生什麼事了?這裡是什麼地方?
Key.Chinesesimp: 操，老兄!发生什么事了?这里是什么地方?

Key.Original: You'll know it... When you see it. You'll know...
Key.Chinese: 你會知道的...當你看到它時。你就會知道了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你会明白的...当你看到它时。你就都明白了...

Key.Original: Take it to Miller... He's... He's north of here...
Key.Chinese: 把它交給Miller...他在...他在這裡的北邊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 把它交给米勒...他在...他在这里的北边...

Key.Original: Two-Zero-Zero... Two-Zero-Zero... Ruins...
Lieutenant - respectfully - what the fuck are you talking about?
Key.Chinese: 上尉-抱歉-你他媽的到底在說什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉-抱歉-你他妈的到底在说什么?

Key.Original: We tried... We...
Key.Chinese: 我們嘗試過了...我們...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们努力了...我们...

Key.Original: Miller? Where? Where north of here?
Key.Chinese: Miller?在哪?這裡北邊的哪裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒?在哪?这里北边的哪里?

Container.name: 30_Wave
Container.situation: james waves at kerry as he approaches.

Key.Original: Over here...
Key.Chinese: 這裡...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里...

Key.Original: Kerry...
Key.Chinese: 克里...
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里...

Container.name: 25_Defeated
Container.participants: EPC B HQ;EPC B Abstract B;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: crossroads informs forces of aaf surrender.

Key.Original: Crossroads, 1-1, go ahead. Over.
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，"1-1"，请讲。完毕。

Key.Original: Wilco. Out.
Key.Chinese: 照辦。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照办。通话完毕。

Key.Original: All units, stand down. I say again, stand down.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，停止交戰。我重複一遍，停止交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，停止交战。我重复一遍，停止交战。

Key.Original: The AAF have issued their formal surrender. Straight from Akhanteros himself.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量已經正式宣告投降。直接由敵軍指揮官Akhanteros本人所說的。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF已经正式宣告投降。直接由敌军指挥官阿坎特罗斯本人发来的。

Key.Original: Hold your fire and prepare to receive POWs.
Key.Chinese: 停止射擊並準備接收戰俘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停止开火并准备接收战俘。

Key.Original: Bravo-1-1, come in, over.
Key.Chinese: "Bravo-1-1"，接進，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃-1-1"，接进，完毕。

Key.Original: Converge on Ioannina and assist with the cleanup, over.
Key.Chinese: 請前往伊奧安尼納會合並協助善後工作，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请前往伊奥安尼纳会合并协助善后工作，完毕。

Key.Original: That goes for you too, Kerry.
Key.Chinese: 你的任務也一樣，克里。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的任务也一样，克里。

Key.Original: Understood, sir. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，長官。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，长官。通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_Contact
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: friendly armor begins to engage the enemy.

Key.Original: Tally on multiple targets. Weapons hot.
Key.Chinese: 確認到多名目標。開始攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认到多名目标。开始攻击。

Container.name: 15_Neutralized
Container.situation: kerry successfully softens enemy forces with artillery.

Key.Original: Copy that, Nomad. All units, commence the assault.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"游牧民"。所有單位，開始攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"游牧民"。所有单位，开始攻击。

Key.Original: Nomad, maintain overwatch. Out.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，你們繼續待在偵察點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，你们继续侦查。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, Nomad, we've softened them up for you. You're clear to move in, over.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，"游牧民"，我們已經把他們給削弱了。你們可以開始進入了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，"游牧民"，我们已经把他们给削弱了。你们可以开始开进了，完毕。

Container.name: 14_Plane_Disengage
Container.participants: EPC B Member;EPC B Player;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: airplane returns to base.

Key.Original: Nomad, Golf-4-1, RTB. Out.
Key.Chinese: "游牧民"，"Golf-4-1"，返回基地。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"，"高尔夫-4-1"，返回基地。通话完毕。

Container.name: 13_Plane_Fired
Container.participants: EPC B Member;EPC B Player;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: airplane opens fire on enemy forces.

Key.Original: Fox-2.

Container.name: 12_Plane_Sent
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B Member;EPC B HQ;
Container.situation: kerry calls in the aircraft.

Key.Original: Golf-4-1, Nomad. You're clear to engage. Over.
Key.Chinese: "Golf-4-1"，"游牧民"。你可以開始攻擊了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "高尔夫-4-1"，"游牧民"。你可以开始攻击了。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, Nomad. Engaging. Golf-4-1.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"游牧民"。交戰中。"Golf-4-1"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"游牧民"。交战中。"高尔夫-4-1"。

Container.name: 10_Orders
Container.situation: crossroads gives kerry his orders.

Key.Original: Kerry, listen up. I want you to take the lead here.
Key.Chinese: 克里，聽好了。我想要讓你指揮這次任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，听好了。我想要让你指挥这次任务。

Key.Original: The AAF have pulled back to Ioannina. Intel believes they're waiting for reinforcements.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量撤退到了伊奧安尼納。情報顯示他們正在等待援軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF撤退到了伊奥安尼纳。情报显示他们正在等待援军。

Key.Original: I want you and your men to coordinate the offensive. Concentrate on anything that poses a threat to Echo-2.
Key.Chinese: 我要你跟你的人馬來協調攻擊行動。處理掉任何會威脅到"Echo"-2的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我要你跟你的手下来协调攻击行动。处理掉任何会威胁到"回声"-2的目标。

Key.Original: Relay your requests to Delta-3 and Golf-4-1. They'll take care of the rest.
Key.Chinese: 你可以發送支援請求給"Delta-3"與"Golf-4-1"。他們會幫你處裡掉你的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以发送支援请求给"德尔塔-3"与"高尔夫-4-1"。他们会帮你处理掉你的目标。

Key.Original: Can I trust you with this, soldier?
Key.Chinese: 我可以信任你嗎，大兵?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可以信任你吗，大兵?

Key.Original: Copy that. Now, get moving.
Key.Chinese: 收到。現在，出發吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。现在，出发吧。

Key.Original: Yes, sir. We'll get it done.
Key.Chinese: 是，長官。我們會把它搞定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是，长官。我们会把它搞定。

Container.name: 05_NATO_Chosen
Container.situation: kerry chose to go with nato.

Key.Original: Kerry, on me.
Key.Chinese: 克里，過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里，过来。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC B HQ;EPC B James;
Container.situation: kerry receives his two choices.

Key.Original: All elements, we're moving out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，我們要前進了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，我们要前进了。

Key.Original: Converge on the main road, grid 218-180. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 在主要道路上會合，座標是218-180。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在主要道路上会合，座标是218-180。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: C'mon, this is getting ridiculous now.
Key.Chinese: 拜託，這地震越來越荒謬了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托，这地震越来越荒谬了。

Key.Original: ... Kerry ... Do you copy? ...
Key.Chinese: ...克里...你有收到嗎?...

Key.Original: Lieutenant? What the fuck? Where are you?
Key.Chinese: 上尉?搞什麼鬼?你在哪?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉?搞什么鬼?你在哪?

Key.Original: Lieutenant James?
Key.Chinese: 上尉詹姆斯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 詹姆斯上尉?

Key.Original: ... What the hell ... 210-189? ... there's nothing up there.
Lieutenant? Respond! ... Goddammit!
Key.Chinese: 上尉?請回答!...天殺的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 上尉?请回答!...天杀的!

Key.Original: Lieutenant James is in trouble. His last known location is at <marker name = 'BIS_CTRG'>210-189</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 上尉詹姆斯有麻煩了。他最後的已知位置座標在<markername='BIS_CTRG'>210-189</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 詹姆斯上尉情况不妙。他最后的已知位置座标在<markername='BIS_CTRG'>210-189</marker>。

Key.Original: Status Quo
Key.Chinese: 現狀
Key.Chinesesimp: 现状

Container.name: x25_WrongWay
Container.situation: player is going the wrong way

Key.Original: What was I thinking? Sorry, we need to turn around.
Key.Chinese: 我到底在想什麼?抱歉，我們必須回頭了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我到底在想什么?抱歉，我们必须回头了。

Container.name: x20_WrongWay
Container.situation: player is going the wrong way

Key.Original: Are you sure we're going the right way?
Key.Chinese: 你確定我們走的方向是正確的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你确定我们走的方向是正确的吗?

Key.Original: Uh, let me check the map.
Key.Chinese: 喔，讓我檢查一下地圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，让我检查一下地图。

Container.name: x15_WrongWay
Container.situation: player is going the wrong way

Key.Original: I must have made a wrong turn somewhere.
Key.Chinese: 我剛剛應該在哪轉錯了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我刚刚应该在哪转错了。

Container.name: x10_CarDamagedIdiot
Container.situation: player crashes the car, rendering it immovable

Key.Original: So, I guess we have time for a few more questions, sergeant?
Key.Chinese: 所以，我猜我們有更多的時間可以多聊幾個問題了，中士?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，我猜我们有更多的时间可以多聊几个问题了，中士?

Key.Original: Ah, shit.
Key.Chinese: 喔，該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，该死。

Container.name: x05_CarDamagedBase
Container.situation: player arrives at the destination point.

Key.Original: Goddammit, Sergeant. It'll take another hour. Meanwhile, do try not to fuck up anything else, understood?.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，中士。那會花上1個小時。現在你啥都不要給我做，了解了嗎?。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，中士。这又得多耽搁1个小时。现在你可千万别再把别的事也给搅和了，了解了吗?。

Key.Original: Uh, Crossroads, Kerry here. We had an - uh - we ran into a small problem here. Can you send another vehicle? Over.
Key.Chinese: 呵，"交叉路"，這裡是克里。我們有點-呵-我們這裡有點小麻煩。你是否能派遣另一輛載具過來?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呵，"交叉路口"，这里是克里。我们有点-呵-我们这里有点小麻烦。你能不能再派一辆车来?完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. We'll just wait here. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。我們會在這邊等。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我们会在这边等。通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_CarDamaged
Container.situation: player crashes the car, rendering it immovable

Key.Original: Shit. This car's done.
Key.Chinese: 該死。這車子報銷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。这车子报销了。

Container.name: 60_RTB
Container.situation: last conversation, hq calls back kerry.

Key.Original: Sergeant Kerry, we've got a situation here, return to the base immediately.
Key.Chinese: 中士克里，我們這裡有點狀況，請立即返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里中士，我们这里有点状况，请立即返回基地。

Key.Original: Not again. Uh, affirmative, Crossroads. I'll be right there.
Key.Chinese: 不要又來了。恩，收到，"交叉路"。我一會兒就到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 又来这破事。嗯，收到，"交叉路口"。我一会儿就到。

Container.name: 57_MeetingNikos_FIANotFriends
Container.situation: journalist and player meet nikos.

Key.Original: Good afternoon, Mr. Panagopoulos. I'm Mark Cole from AAN. Do you have a second?
Key.Chinese: 下午好，帕纳戈普洛斯先生。我是來自AAN的馬克·科爾。你是否有點時間?
Key.Chinesesimp: 下午好，帕纳戈普洛斯先生。我是来自AAN的马克·科尔。是否能耽误您一点时间?

Key.Original: Oh, yes, of course. Get lost, Kerry. Welcome to my homeland, Mr. Cole. There is much to discuss.
Key.Chinese: 喔，有的，當然。滾開，克里。科爾先生，歡迎來到我的家園。來吧，我們還有很多可以聊的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，有的，当然。滚开，克里。科尔先生，欢迎来到我的家园。来吧，我们还有很多可以聊的。

Container.name: 55_MeetingNikos_FIAFriends
Container.situation: journalist and player meet nikos.

Key.Original: Good afternoon, Mr. Panagopoulos. I'm Mark Cole from AAN. Do you have a second?
Key.Chinese: 下午好，帕纳戈普洛斯先生。我是來自AAN的馬克·科爾。你是否有點時間?
Key.Chinesesimp: 下午好，帕纳戈普洛斯先生。我是来自AAN的马克·科尔。能否耽误您一点时间?

Key.Original: Oh, yes, of course. My thanks, Ben. Welcome to my homeland, Mr. Cole. There is much to discuss.
Key.Chinese: 喔，有的，當然。謝拉，本。科爾先生，歡迎來到我的家園。來吧，我們還有很多可以聊的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，有的，当然。谢啦，本。科尔先生，欢迎来到我的家园。来吧，我们还有很多可以聊的。

Container.name: 50_AtDestination
Container.situation: player arrives at the destination point.

Key.Original: Thanks for the ride, sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 感謝你載我一程，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢你载我一程，中士。

Key.Original: Listen, if you ever want to talk some more, just give me a call.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，假如你還想分享更多的事情，請打個電話給我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，假如你还想分享更多的事情，请打个电话给我。

Key.Original: Okay, we're here.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们到了。

Key.Original: Nikos - uh, Mr. Panagopoulos - is that guy in the shirt over there. Take care.
Key.Chinese: 尼科斯-呵，帕納戈普洛斯先生-就是那邊穿西裝的傢伙。請多保重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尼科斯-呵，帕纳戈普洛斯先生-就是那边穿西装的家伙。请多保重。

Key.Original: Copy that, Mr. Cole. Take it easy.
Key.Chinese: 收到，科爾先生。別緊張。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，科尔先生。别紧张。

Container.name: 45_ChatToDestination2
Container.situation: 2nd chit chat on the way from oil station to destination point.

Key.Original: Just one last question then, sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 最後一個問題，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后一个问题，中士。

Key.Original: Did British forces play any part in this incident?
Key.Chinese: 英軍有在此次事件中有扮演任何角色嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 英军在此次事件中扮演了什么角色吗?

Key.Original: Alright, we're almost there.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們快要到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们快要到了。

Key.Original: Yeah, that's what the UK government keeps saying - hell, they almost seem to believe it.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，這也是英國政府一直在說的事情-該死，大眾幾乎就要相信他們了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是阿，英国政府也一直这么说-该死，大众简直就要相信他们了。

Key.Original: Shoot.
Key.Chinese: 說吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 说吧。

Key.Original: Tell me, Sergeant, have you ever met Kostas Stavrou?
Key.Chinese: 告訴我，中士，你有沒有遇見過科斯塔斯·斯塔夫魯?
Key.Chinesesimp: 告诉我，中士，你有没有见过科斯塔斯·斯塔夫鲁?

Key.Original: What do you mean? They shipped out long before the flashpoint started.
Key.Chinese: 你的意思是?他們在戰爭爆發前老早就撤走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的意思是?他们在冲突爆发前老早就撤走了。

Key.Original: Then why don't you ask him?
Key.Chinese: 那你為什麼不問他呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那你为什么不问问他呢?

Key.Original: I'm not sure I follow here.
Key.Chinese: 我不太明白你的意思。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我有点没跟上你说什么。

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 有阿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有啊。

Container.name: 43_RadioBroadcast2
Container.situation: radio broadcast nr. 2.

Key.Original: Breaking news from the Republic of Altis and Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 來自阿爾蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和國的最新消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来自阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国的最新消息。

Key.Original: Today, the Altis minister of defense, Nikos Panagopoulos, announced his presidential candidacy.
Key.Chinese: 今天，阿爾蒂斯的國防部長尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯，宣布他將要競選總統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天，阿尔蒂斯的国防部长尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯宣布他将要竞选总统。

Key.Original: Panagopoulos, a former merchant, had strong ties with the FIA during the recent flashpoint.
Key.Chinese: 帕纳戈普洛斯，一個前商人，在前陣子的戰爭期間曾緊密協助過自由獨立同盟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 帕纳戈普洛斯，一个前商人，在前阵子的战争期间曾紧密协助过自由独立同盟。

Key.Original: The capitulation of the AAF to NATO forces opened up a new wave of negotiation between the FIA and the government in Pyrgos.
Key.Chinese: 在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量向北約投降之後，自由獨立同盟就立即開始與皮爾戈斯的政府進行協商。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在AAF向北约投降之后，自由独立同盟就立即开始与皮尔戈斯的政府进行协商。

Key.Original: In recent weeks, Panagopoulos has established himself as a skillful diplomat, and is a central figure in the post-conflict reconstruction.
Key.Chinese: 在過去幾個星期裡，帕纳戈普洛斯不只證明了他是位出色的外交家，更是在戰後重建中不可或缺的一位人物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在过去几个星期里，帕纳戈普洛斯不只证明了他是位出色的外交家，更是在战后重建中不可或缺的一位人物。

Key.Original: This is Paul Goddard, reporting for AAN.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是保羅·高達爾德，從AAN為你帶來的最新消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是AAN的保罗·高达尔德为你带来的最新消息。

Container.name: 40_ChatToDestination
Container.situation: chit chat on the way from oil station to destination point.

Key.Original: Okay, then. Change of topic.
Key.Chinese: 好吧。讓我們換個話題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。让我们换个话题。

Key.Original: I was told that Mr. Panagopoulos was involved with guerrillas during the flashpoint. Is that correct?
Key.Chinese: 我聽說到帕纳戈普洛斯先生曾在戰爭期間擔任過反抗軍。是這樣嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听说到帕纳戈普洛斯先生曾在战争期间当过游击队。是真的吗?

Key.Original: It is but, c'mon, I'd like to know what he's actually done for the FIA.
Key.Chinese: 是這樣沒錯，不過我想問的是，他真正為自由獨立同盟做的工作是什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是这样没错，不过我想问的是，他真正为自由独立同盟做的工作是什么。

Key.Original: Sure. I thought that was a public knowledge.
Key.Chinese: 是阿。我想那些是大家都已經知道的事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊。我还以为那些事情大家都知道了。

Key.Original: Why don't you ask him when we get there?
Key.Chinese: 何不等下你就自己問他呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 要不等我们到了你自己问他吧?

Container.name: 37_CarAccident
Container.situation: player encounters a car accident.

Key.Original: What happened here?
Key.Chinese: 這裡發生了甚麼事?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里发生了什么事?

Key.Original: I dunno. The locals, though - uh - not exactly known for their courteous driving.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道。這些當地人，他們完全就不按規則來駕駛汽車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道。这些当地人，呃，开车并不是很客气。

Key.Original: And these damn goats! Christ. I'm telling you, you gotta be on the lookout for them around every corner.
Key.Chinese: 還有那些天殺的山羊!老天啊。我必須跟你老實說，你在這開車的時候必須眼觀四方，防止他們突然從哪個角落突然碰出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有那些天杀的山羊!老天啊。我必须跟你老实说，你在这开车的时候必须眼观四方，防止它们突然冒出来。

Container.name: 35_ReFueled
Container.situation: player refills the car oil tank at the station.

Key.Original: Alright. That should do it.
Key.Chinese: 好的。這樣應該就夠用了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。这样应该就行了。

Container.name: 30_ChatToOilStation
Container.situation: chit chat on the way to oil station.

Key.Original: So, tell me, sergeant. Have you been here from the start?
Key.Chinese: 所以，請跟我聊聊，中士。你是否一開始就在這邊了呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，请跟我聊聊，中士。你是否一开始就在这边了呢?

Key.Original: I mean the start of the flashpoint.
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是戰爭開始的時候。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是冲突开始的时候。

Key.Original: And?
Key.Chinese: 還有呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有呢?

Key.Original: What caused it? The public's waiting for an explanation.
Key.Chinese: 是什麼原因造成戰爭的?社會大眾正在等一個解釋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是什么原因造成战争的?社会大众正在等一个解释。

Key.Original: Uh, yeah. Actually few months before the first AAF attack.
Key.Chinese: 呵，是的。事實上是在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量攻擊前幾個月就在這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呵，是的。事实上是在AAF攻击前几个月就在这里了。

Key.Original: And who, in your view, gave them that push?
Key.Chinese: 還有誰，在你的認知中，是誰支持他們這樣做?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么在你看来，是谁给他们这么做的动机呢?

Key.Original: I don't follow...
Key.Chinese: 我不明白你的意思...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不明白你的意思...

Key.Original: Oh, believe me, Sergeant Kerry, I'm trying.
Key.Chinese: 喔，相信我，中士克里，我已經在試了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，相信我，克里中士，我已经在试了。

Key.Original: I'm not really at liberty to talk about that.
Key.Chinese: 我不太有權限來談論這件事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不太方便对这件事发表看法。

Key.Original: But, speaking off the record ... they still don't really know for sure.
Key.Chinese: 不過，老實來講...他們到現在都還沒有搞清楚真正的原因。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，老实来讲...他们到现在都还没有搞清楚真正的原因。

Key.Original: I mean, Christ, sure, it's easy to blame CSAT. But the greenbacks - sorry, the AAF - they definitely needed a push.
Key.Chinese: 我的意思是，天啊，當然了，這很容易就會知道這跟廣協同盟有關。你也知道那些綠軍-抱歉，我的意思是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量-他們真的很需要推一把。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的意思是，天啊，当然了，这很容易就会知道这跟广协有关。你也知道那些绿军-抱歉，我的意思是AAF-他们真的很需要推一把。

Key.Original: Isn't that supposed to be your job to find out?
Key.Chinese: 找出原因不就是你的工作該做的事嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 找出原因不就是你的工作吗?

Container.name: 25_LowFuel
Container.situation: player finds out that the car is almost dry.

Key.Original: I'd have thought everything was at least a hybrid these days.
Key.Chinese: 我還以為現在所有的車都已經改成油電混合了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我还以为现在所有的车都至少已经改成油电混合了。

Key.Original: Goddammit. Looks like this piece of junk's almost outta gas.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的。看來這坨垃圾已經快要沒有油了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的。看来这坨垃圾已经快要没有油了。

Key.Original: Alright, slight detour. We need to fill up.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，讓我們繞一下路。去把油加滿吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，稍微绕一下路。我们得去加个油。

Key.Original: No kidding.
Key.Chinese: 別開玩笑了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别开玩笑了。

Container.name: 20_RadioBroadcast1
Container.situation: radio broadcast nr. 1. this can happen as soon as the car is started, to avoid awkward transitions.

Key.Original: As the projected costs of the Mediterranean flashpoint rises to over four billion dollars, several NATO member states face increased pressure to further cut military funding.
Key.Chinese: 這次地中海戰爭所帶來的花費，預估超過了四十億美元，幾個北約的成員國都面臨壓力而開始設法縮減軍費。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这次地中海战争所带来的花费，预估超过了四十亿美元，几个北约的成员国都面临压力而开始设法缩减军费。

Key.Original: A Freedom of Information request revealed that this is mostly attributed to heavy material losses and the destruction of strategic installations.
Key.Chinese: 據內幕消息指出，可能是因為物資與戰略設施損壞嚴重所致。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据内幕消息指出，可能是因为物资与战略设施损坏严重所致。

Key.Original: And, with several hundred dead soldiers, this month-long flashpoint looks set to become one of the most costly NATO operations in recent history.
Key.Chinese: 而且，在此次一個月的戰爭中，陣亡的士兵有數百人，這可能會成為北約歷史上最慘烈的幾場戰役之一。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且，在此次一个月的战争中，阵亡的士兵有数百人，这可能会成为北约最近损失最惨重的一次行动。

Key.Original: In past few months - and alongside the ongoing economic crisis - both the strength and integrity of the North-Atlantic Alliance has come into question in what many consider to be a critical turning point for NATO.
Key.Chinese: 在過去幾個月裡-隨著經濟危機的發生-北約在實力與完整性上都出現了漏洞，遭人討論與質疑。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在过去几个月里-随着经济危机的发生-北约在实力与整合力上都出现了漏洞，遭人讨论与质疑。

Container.name: 15_CarFound
Container.situation: player found the car.

Key.Original: Ah, got it.
Key.Chinese: 啊，找到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，找到了。

Key.Original: C'mon, hop in!
Key.Chinese: 來，進來吧!
Key.Chinesesimp: 来，进来吧!

Container.name: 10_GetCar
Container.situation: player and journalist are going to look for the car.

Key.Original: Uh, just a sec - they've given me a bunch of keys.
Key.Chinese: 呃，請等我一下-他們給了我一大串的鑰匙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，请等我一下-他们给了我一大串钥匙。

Key.Original: Supposed to be car around here somewhere - a red off-road.
Key.Chinese: 我記得車子應該是停在這附近-是一臺紅色的越野皮卡貨車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我记得车子应该是停在这附近-是一台红色的越野皮卡。

Container.name: 05_MeetingWithJournalist
Container.situation: player meets the journalist at the airport, near helipad.

Key.Original: Yes. Mark Cole, AAN Network. Are you my ride?
Key.Chinese: 是的。馬克·科爾，AAN世界新聞。你是來接我的嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。马克·科尔，AAN世界新闻。你是来接我的吗?

Key.Original: Mr. Cole?
Key.Chinese: 是科爾先生嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是科尔先生吗?

Key.Original: Seems so. Sergeant Ben Kerry. Welcome to Altis.
Key.Chinese: 似乎是這樣。中士本·克里。歡迎來到阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 似乎是这样。中士本·克里。欢迎来到阿尔蒂斯。

Key.Original: I'm supposed to take you to Nikos. I mean Mr. Panagopoulos.
Key.Chinese: 我要帶你去見尼科斯。我的意思是帕纳戈普洛斯先生。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我要带你去见尼科斯。我的意思是帕纳戈普洛斯先生。

Key.Original: Let's get going.
Key.Chinese: 我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走吧。

Container.name: 01_PlayerArrived
Container.participants: EPC B Abstract A;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: a car carrying kerry stops close to airport parking area to drop kerry.

Key.Original: Hey, Kerry, we're here.
Key.Chinese: 嗨，克里，我們到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，克里，我们到了。

Key.Original: No worries. Just keep outta trouble!
Key.Chinese: 不要擔心。只要你保持遠離麻煩就好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要担心。只要你别惹麻烦就行!

Key.Original: Thanks for the ride, man.
Key.Chinese: 謝謝你送我一程，老兄。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢你送我一程，老兄。

Key.Original: Six weeks after the flashpoint's resolution, Kerry is handed a special task.
Key.Chinese: 在戰爭結束後六星期，克里被交付了一個特殊的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在战争结束后六星期，克里领到了一个特殊的任务。

Key.Original: Await the arrival of an AAN reporter and deliver him to his interview with Nikos Panagopoulos.
Key.Chinese: 與剛抵達的AAN記者碰面，並護送他前去採訪尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待AAN记者到达，并把他带去采访尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯。

Key.Original:
Six weeks have passed since the AAF's capitulation.

The FIA, under the leadership of Nikos Panagopoulos, have transitioned from a military opposition to a political body and, alongside our forces, are working hard to restore their homeland. Although it will take time for this country to recover from war, the new government has the confidence of the people of Altis.

However, NATO's invasion - albeit swift and, ultimately, successful - has stirred a new round of debates over the funding of military forces in this region. The conclusion was clear: there is no way NATO can maintain their position here while tensions in the pacific region rise. The decommissioning will continue and NATO will abandon this region.
Key.Chinese:
在阿爾蒂斯武裝力量投降後已經過了六個星期。

自由獨立同盟在尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯的帶領下，從反抗軍轉變為政治團體，與北約一同努力來重建他們的家園。雖然他們還要好一段時間才能走出戰爭的陰霾，不過新政府是很受阿爾蒂斯人民愛戴的。

而藉由北約的入侵，並迅速的獲得最後的勝利-這讓原本要撤軍的這區，又開始新一次的辯論，討論是否要投注更多的資金在這區域的防守。但討論的結果很明確:北約已經沒法在這保持更多的兵力了，因為他們還要應付太平洋日漸增溫的緊張局勢。撤軍的計劃還是繼續執行，北約將會放棄這塊區域。
Key.Chinesesimp:
在AAF投降后已经过了六个星期。

自由独立同盟在尼科斯·帕纳戈普洛斯的带领下，从游击队转型为政治团体，与北约一同努力来重建他们的家园。虽然他们还要好一段时间才能走出战争的阴霾，不过新政府是很受阿尔蒂斯人民爱戴的。

虽然北约此次行动非常顺利，并且获得了最后的胜利-但还是激起了该区域军费预算问题的讨论。结论很明确:北约已经没法在这保持更多的兵力了，因为他们还要应付太平洋日渐增温的紧张局势。撤军的计划还是继续执行，北约将会放弃这块区域。

Key.Original: The Car Was Destroyed
Key.Chinese: 車子毀了
Key.Chinesesimp: 车子毁了

Key.Original: Collateral damage is not allowed
Key.Chinese: 間接傷害是不被允許的
Key.Chinesesimp: 连带伤害是不被允许的

Key.Original: Journalist was wounded
Key.Chinese: 記者受傷了
Key.Chinesesimp: 记者受伤了

Key.Original: You were wounded
Key.Chinese: 你受傷了
Key.Chinesesimp: 你受伤了

Key.Original: Escort the journalist to Athira and introduce him to Nikos.
Key.Chinese: 護送記者到阿西拉，並把他介紹給尼科斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送记者到阿西拉，并把他介绍给尼科斯。

Key.Original: ESCORT
Key.Chinese: 護送
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送

Key.Original: Escort journalist
Key.Chinese: 護送記者
Key.Chinesesimp: 护送记者

Key.Original: Find the car at Altis airport parking area.
Key.Chinese: 找到停在阿爾蒂斯機場停車場裡的車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到停在阿尔蒂斯机场停车场里的车。

Key.Original: GET IN
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: Get the car
Key.Chinese: 拿到車
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿到车

Key.Original: Meet the AAN at Altis airport.
Key.Chinese: 與AAN的記者在阿爾蒂斯機場碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与AAN的记者在阿尔蒂斯机场碰面。

Key.Original: MEET
Key.Chinese: 碰面
Key.Chinesesimp: 碰面

Key.Original: Pickup journalist
Key.Chinese: 接記者
Key.Chinesesimp: 接记者

Key.Original: Get a full tank of gas at one of the nearby oil stations.
Key.Chinese: 請到附近的加油站把油給加滿。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到附近的加油站加满一箱油。

Key.Original: REFUEL
Key.Chinese: 加油
Key.Chinesesimp: 加油

Key.Original: Refuel (optional)
Key.Chinese: 加油(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 加油(支线任务)

Key.Original: Game Over
Key.Chinese: 遊戲結束
Key.Chinesesimp: 游戏结束

Container.name: 50_Escaped
Container.situation: kerry leaves island

Key.Original: Finally.
Key.Chinese: 終於。
Key.Chinesesimp: 终于。

Key.Original: Can't say I'm sad to see that place go ...
Key.Chinese: 看到這塊地變成這樣我還是挺難過的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到这块地变成这样我还是挺难过的...

Key.Original: But now what?
Key.Chinese: 但是現在該怎辦?
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是现在该怎办?

Container.name: 45_FIAJoin
Container.participants: EPC B Player;EPC I Guerrilla A;
Container.situation: kerry takes command over fia remnants

Key.Original: Thank God. We would have died in this shithole.
Key.Chinese: 感謝老天。我們以為我們會死在這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢老天。我们以为我们会死在这破地方了。

Key.Original: Our whole island is on fire, we must go!
Key.Chinese: 我們的整座島嶼已經毀了，我們必須離開!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的整座岛屿已经被战火包围，我们必须离开!

Key.Original: Finally, here you are, follow me.
Key.Chinese: 終於，找到你們了，跟隨我吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 终于，找到你们了，跟随我吧。

Container.name: 40_FIA
Container.participants: EPC I Guerrilla A;EPC B Player;
Container.situation: fia remnants call for help

Key.Original: Nikos, Kostas?! Andreas? Does anybody hear me?
Key.Chinese: 尼科斯，科斯塔斯?!安德里亞斯?有任何人能聽見嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 尼科斯，科斯塔斯?!安德里亚斯?有谁能听到我说话吗?

Key.Original: Hello, Kerry? I know you! I'm from the FIA, group East. Can you help us?
Key.Chinese: 哈囉，克里?我知道你!我是自由獨立同盟的一員，隸屬於東面支部。你能幫助我們嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈啰，克里?我知道你!我是自由独立同盟的一员，隶属于东支部。你能帮助我们吗?

Key.Original: We're in the middle of the swamp. CSAT forces are in close proximity, but the entire area is mined - we're stuck here!
Key.Chinese: 我們在沼澤的正中間。廣協同盟部隊離我們不遠，而地雷就散佈在我們四周-我們被困住了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在沼泽的正中间。广协部队离我们不远，四周都被布了雷-我们被困住了!

Key.Original: It's Sergeant Kerry, identify yourself!
Key.Chinese: 這裡是中士克里，請表明你的身份!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是克里中士，请表明你的身份!

Key.Original: Listen. There's an AAF heliport nearby. We can escape together from there if you can help us out.
Key.Chinese: 聽著。這裡附近有一個阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的直升機停機坪。假如你幫助我們，我們可以一起從那邊逃離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着。这里附近有一个AAF的直升机停机坪。假如你帮助我们，我们可以一起从那边逃离。

Key.Original: Thank God. Okay ... we'll wait. Just be aware, we've got one AAF guy with us - he's friendly - so don't shoot him!
Key.Chinese: 感謝老天。好的...我們會在這邊等。但請小心，我們這裡還有一個阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的傢伙跟著我們-他是友軍-所以請不要誤擊他!
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢老天。好的...我们会在这边等。但请小心，我们这里还有一个AAF的家伙跟着我们-他是友军-所以请不要误击他!

Key.Original: Alright, I'll see what I can do.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我會看看我能做些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我会看看我能做些什么。

Container.name: 35_NATOJoin
Container.situation: kerry takes command of nato survivors

Key.Original: Hold fire - I'm friendly!
Key.Chinese: 不要開火-我是友軍!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要开火-我是友军!

Key.Original: Finally! Okay, Sergeant, you lead. Let's get us all out of here.
Key.Chinese: 終於!好的，中士，你帶頭吧。讓我們離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 终于!好的，中士，你带头吧。让我们离开这里。

Container.name: 30_NATO
Container.situation: bravo 2-1 calls for help

Key.Original: I hear you Bravo. It's Sergeant Kerry here. What's your status? I'm cut off in the middle of nowhere. Can you assist?
Key.Chinese: 我聽到你了"Bravo"。這裡是中士克里。你們的狀況如何?我這裡一點頭緒都沒有。你能提供幫助嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听到你了"布拉沃"。这里是克里中士。你们的状况如何?我这前不着村后不着店的。你能提供帮助吗?

Key.Original: Okay. Right ... Okay, just stay put. I'll find some truck and pick you up.
Key.Chinese: 好。好吧...恩，你們堅持住。我會試著找輛卡車去接你們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。好吧...嗯，你们坚持住。我看看能不能找辆卡车去接你们。

Key.Original: This is Bravo-2-1, does anybody read me? Anyone - what the fuck is going on!?
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"Bravo-2-1"，有沒有任何人聽到?任何人-現在到底發生了什麼事情!?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"布拉沃-2-1"，有没有任何人听到?任何人-现在到底发生了什么事情!?

Key.Original: Assist? Shit, man, we're in need of help ourselves!
Key.Chinese: 幫助?該死，老兄，我們自己也需要幫助!
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助?该死，老兄，我们自己也需要帮助!

Key.Original: Our transport was knocked out. We're holed up in some construction site ... north of Paros.
Key.Chinese: 我們的交通工具已經報銷了。我們正躲在某個工地裡...在帕羅斯的北邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的交通工具已经报销了。我们正躲在某个工地里...在帕罗斯的北边。

Key.Original: Appreciated. Oh, and just a head's up: try to avoid any large settlements and the airbase - CSAT's executed a massive invasion on the whole island.
Key.Chinese: 非常感謝。喔，順便提醒你:請試著避開城鎮與空軍基地-廣協同盟已經入侵整座島嶼各處重要的地方了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常感谢。喔，顺便提醒你:请试着避开城镇与空军基地-广协已经入侵整座岛屿各处重要的地方了。

Key.Original: From what we've seen, even the Greenbacks and CSAT are now hostile to each other. Some serious shit must have gone down.
Key.Chinese: 根據我們之前所看到的，現在綠軍跟廣協同盟也已經開始互相交戰了。一定發生了些重大的事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据我们之前所看到的，现在绿军跟广协也已经开始互相交战了。一定发生了些重大的事情。

Container.name: 25_Device
Container.situation: kerry finds out about the bomb

Key.Original: What's all this seismic shit about?
Key.Chinese: 這些地震研究到底要來做什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些地震研究到底要来做什么?

Key.Original: Just what the hell are you planning on doing with it, Miller?
Key.Chinese: 你到底在計劃些什麼，米勒?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你到底在计划些什么，米勒?

Container.name: 20_GameOver
Container.situation: kerry to himself

Key.Original: Shit. I've gotta get out of here.
Key.Chinese: 該死。我最好要離開這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。我得赶紧离开这里了。

Key.Original: Okay, keep calm. Best bet'll be to find some boat - maybe catch an evac heli.
Key.Chinese: 好的，保持冷靜。我最好找艘船-或是搭上撤離直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，保持冷静。我最好找艘船-或是搭上撤离直升机。

Key.Original: Ports and LZs should be marked on my map. But I'd better stay the hell out of trouble...
Key.Chinese: 港口跟降落點應該都有標記在我的地圖上。不過我最好盡量遠離麻煩...
Key.Chinesesimp: 港口跟降落点应该都有标记在我的地图上。不过我最好尽量远离麻烦...

Container.name: 16_Crossroads
Container.situation: blufor hq for all units

Key.Original: Crossroads to all units, Crossroads to all units, do not...
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致所有單位，"交叉路"致所有單位，不要...
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致所有单位，"交叉路口"致所有单位，不要...

Container.name: 15_SOS
Container.situation: kerry calls sos

Key.Original: Sergeant Kerry to any nearby units, does anyone read?
Key.Chinese: 中士克里呼叫附近所有的單位，有任何人聽見嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里中士呼叫附近所有的单位，有任何人听见吗?

Key.Original: Please respond! Anybody!
Key.Chinese: 請回答!任何人都好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请回话!谁都好!

Container.name: 10_LeftBehind
Container.situation: kerry to himself

Key.Original: Falcon, goddammit, do you read me?
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，天殺的，你是否有聽到?
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，天杀的，你是否有听到?

Key.Original: Son of a bitch.
Key.Chinese: 狗娘養的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 狗娘养的。

Container.name: 05_Miller
Container.situation: miller responds

Key.Original: What?!
Key.Chinese: 什麼?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么?!

Key.Original: Are you fucking kidding me? Fuck you, Miller!
Key.Chinese: 你是在給我開什麼玩笑?幹你媽的，米勒!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈在逗我?干你妈的，米勒!

Key.Original: Kerry? Look, the situation has changed. It's too late.
Key.Chinese: 克里?聽著，狀況有些改變了。已經太遲了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 克里?听着，状况有些改变了。已经太迟了。

Key.Original: What we're dealing with here - I simply cannot take the risk - we can't return to the warzone.
Key.Chinese: 我還在這裡處理一些事情-而且我不能承擔風險-我們已經無法返回戰區了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我还在这里处理一些事情-我不能冒这个险-我们不能再返回战区了。

Key.Original: I'm sorry. You're on your own.
Key.Chinese: 我很抱歉。你必須靠你自己了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我很抱歉。靠你自己吧。

Key.Original: I risked my ass - saved your life - what, all for a fucking suicide mission?
Key.Chinese: 我曾冒過風險-去救了你的小命-這全部都為了什麼，只為執行一個自殺任務?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我冒着生命危险-救过你的小命-怎么，所有这些都只是为了个自杀任务?

Key.Original: Miller? Respond! Just what the hell was this all about?!
Key.Chinese: 米勒?請回答!你他媽的到底是什麼意思?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 米勒?请回答!这他妈都什么情况?!

Container.name: 01_Prolog
Container.situation: kerry calling miller

Key.Original: Falcon, it's Kerry, do you read me?
Key.Chinese: "獵鷹"，這裡是克里，你是否有聽到?
Key.Chinesesimp: "猎鹰"，这里是克里，你是否有听到?

Key.Original: I say again, Falcon, do you copy?
Key.Chinese: 我重複一遍，"獵鷹"，你是否有收到?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我重复一遍，"猎鹰"，你是否有收到?

Key.Original: Stay alive. Escape Altis.
Key.Chinese: 努力活下去。並逃離阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 努力活下去。并逃离阿尔蒂斯。

Key.Original: Despite the circumstances, now's the only chance to get some answers. There must be at least something inside the %2scientific module%1 of the CSAT research base.
Key.Chinese: 儘管現在情勢如此危急，但也只有現在才有機會調查清楚到底他們在研究什麼。在那個廣協同盟的%2研究基地%1中一定還有剩下些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管情势如此危急，但想查个水落石出也只能趁现在了。在那个广协的%2科研基地%1中一定还至少剩了些什么。

Key.Original: Investigate Dome (optional)
Key.Chinese: 調查研究基地(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查研究基地(支线任务)

Key.Original: SEEK ANSWERS
Key.Chinese: 尋找答案
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找答案

Key.Original: Use any means to escape from the island before it's too late. Find some boat or catch an evac heli and get as far from the island as you can.
Key.Chinese: 在一切都太遲之前，趕緊逃離這座島。你可以尋找船或直升機來幫助你逃離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在一切都太迟之前，用一切手段赶紧逃离这座岛。找艘船或者救援直升机跑得越远越好。

Key.Original: Escape from Altis
Key.Chinese: 逃離阿爾蒂斯
Key.Chinesesimp: 逃离阿尔蒂斯

Key.Original: Join a small group of %2FIA remnants%1. As they're trapped in a minefield, a mine detector - or MRAP - will be vital instruments to get there and back in one piece. Try to find some or try your luck.
Key.Chinese: 救援一小隊%2殘餘的自由獨立同盟部隊%1。他們誤入了地雷區，一個地雷探測器-或是一臺防地雷反伏擊車-皆可以安全的帶他們離開那裡。要不你也可以試試自己的運氣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 救援一小队%2残余的自由独立同盟部队%1。他们误入了地雷区，一个地雷探测器-或是一台防地雷反伏击车-皆可以安全的带他们离开那里。要不你也可以试试自己的运气。

Key.Original: Join FIA (optional)
Key.Chinese: 救援自由獨立同盟(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 救援自由独立同盟(支线任务)

Key.Original: JOIN
Key.Chinese: 救援
Key.Chinesesimp: 救援

Key.Original: Join a small group of %2NATO survivors%1 hiding in a construction site north of Paros.
Key.Chinese: 救援一小隊%2北約的倖存者%1，他們正藏匿在帕羅斯北邊的工地裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 救援一小队%2北约的幸存者%1，他们正藏匿在帕罗斯北边的工地里。

Key.Original: Join NATO (optional)
Key.Chinese: 救援北約(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 救援北约(支线任务)

Key.Original: JOIN
Key.Chinese: 救援
Key.Chinesesimp: 救援

Key.Original: %2Wait for%1 captain Miller to get you off the island.
Key.Chinese: %2等待%1上校米勒帶你離開這座島。
Key.Chinesesimp: %2等待%1米勒上校带你离开这座岛。

Key.Original: Wait for Miller
Key.Chinese: 等待米勒
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待米勒

Key.Original: WAIT
Key.Chinese: 等待
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Wait for Cpt. Miller to extract you from Altis.
Key.Chinese: 等待上校米勒帶你逃離阿爾蒂斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待米勒上校带你逃离阿尔蒂斯。

Key.Original:
All hell's broken loose.
CSAT has made a massive counter-attack and the whole island is in flames. It feels like it's the beginning of a global war.

We thought that the whole conflict would be over in the next few hours - that the AAF would simply surrender - but, instead, it's escalated beyond control. I don't know exactly what that 'thing' I handed to Miller was, but CSAT certainly seems to value it highly.

I've got to get out of here.
Key.Chinese:
一切都完了。
廣協同盟做出了大規模的反擊，整個島都已經陷入了火海。這看來就像是世界大戰的開始。

我們認為在幾小時的衝突之後，阿爾蒂斯武裝力量就會投降了。我並不知道我到底把什麼'東西'交給了米勒，不過看來廣協同盟真的把它看得很重要。

我必須逃離這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp:
一切都完了。
广协做出了大规模的反击，整个岛都已经陷入了火海。这看来就像是世界大战的开始。

我们认为在几小时的冲突之后，AAF就会直接投降了。之后，冲突升级会进一步失控。我并不知道我到底把什么'东西'交给了米勒，不过看来广协真的把它看得很重要。

我必须逃离这里了。

Key.Original: Airbase
Key.Chinese: 空軍基地
Key.Chinesesimp: 空军基地

Key.Original: Airfield
Key.Chinese: 機場
Key.Chinesesimp: 机场

Key.Original: FIA remnants
Key.Chinese: 殘餘的自由獨立同盟部隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 自由独立同盟幸存者

Key.Original: Heliport
Key.Chinese: 直升機停機坪
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机停机坪

Key.Original: NATO survivors
Key.Chinese: 北約倖存者
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约幸存者

Key.Original: Naval base
Key.Chinese: 海軍基地
Key.Chinesesimp: 海军基地

Key.Original: Port
Key.Chinese: 港口
Key.Chinesesimp: 港口

Key.Original: Research base
Key.Chinese: 研究基地
Key.Chinesesimp: 研究基地

Key.Original: Guerrillas have pinned down an %2AAF squad%1 and are in need of close air support. They will designate the targets' approximate positions by orange smoke shells and their own with green ones.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍被%2阿爾蒂斯武裝力量小隊%1給壓制住了，他們非常需要空中支援。他們會使用橘色煙霧來標記敵人，並用綠色煙霧標記自己。
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队被%2AAF小队%1给压制住了，他们非常需要近距空中支援。他们会使用橘色烟雾来标记敌人大概位置，并用绿色烟雾标记自己。

Container.name: x35_ParachutingAboveWater
Container.situation: player parachuted above water

Key.Original: Ah, shit, looks like a wet landing...
Key.Chinese: 喔，幹，看來這下我會濕身了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，操，看来这下我会湿身了...

Container.name: x30_LandedIntoWater
Container.situation: player landed into water

Key.Original: Shit, I knew I should have packed my water wings.
Key.Chinese: 該死，我就知道我該帶些浮圈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我就知道我早该带些救生圈。

Container.name: x25_ParachutingAboveLand
Container.situation: player parachuted above land

Key.Original: Ah, Christ, I'd better avoid those trees...
Key.Chinese: 喔，天啊，我最好避開那些樹...
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，天啊，我最好避开那些树...

Container.name: x20_LandedOnGround
Container.situation: player landed on ground

Key.Original: Shit. At least it's better than landing in the sea...
Key.Chinese: 該死。至少不是在海上迫降...
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好在至少不是海上迫降...

Container.name: x15_Mayday
Container.situation: avenger falling down

Key.Original: Understood, Avenger, we'll dispatch CSAR ASAP.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"復仇者"，我們將會盡快派遣搜救人員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"复仇者"，我们将会尽快派遣搜救人员。

Key.Original: We'll track your signal. Sit tight and wait for them. Hold on, captain.
Key.Chinese: 我們會追蹤你的信號。請留在原地並等待他們。堅持住，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会追踪你的信号。请留在原地并等待他们。坚持住，上尉。

Key.Original: Mayday, Mayday, Avenger's going down! I'm in flames here - I've got to eject!
Key.Chinese: 求救，求救，"復仇者"正在墜落!我已經陷在火海裡-我必須跳傘了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 求救，求救，"复仇者"正在坠落!我已经陷在火海里-我必须跳伞了!

Container.name: x10_HeliDestroyedLate
Container.situation: player confirming late heli destruction

Key.Original: Understood, at least they'll have one less from now on. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解，至少他們還是有點損失。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，至少他们还是有点损失。完毕。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, I've intercepted the helo on its way back.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，我在直升機的歸途中攔截了它。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，我在直升机的归途中拦截了它。

Container.name: x05_HeliEscaped
Container.situation: control tower radio

Key.Original: Control tower to Avenger, too late, we've lost that radar contact. It's almost certainly landed.
Key.Chinese: 塔臺呼叫"復仇者"，已經太遲了，我們的雷達已經失去直升機的訊號。它應該已經著陸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔台呼叫"复仇者"，已经太迟了，我们的雷达已经失去直升机的信号。它应该已经着陆了。

Container.name: x01_ConvoyPassed
Container.situation: hq call

Key.Original: Avenger, What the hell have you been doing?
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，你他媽的在搞什麼飛機啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，你他妈的在搞什么飞机啊?

Key.Original: I've just been informed that the enemy supply convoy's arrived at Paros.
Key.Chinese: 我剛剛接到訊息說敵軍的補給車隊已經抵達了帕羅斯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我刚刚接到信息说敌军的补给车队已经抵达了帕罗斯。

Container.name: 95_IFVHit
Container.situation: confirming ifv hit

Key.Original: Well done, carry on.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，請保持下去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，请保持下去。

Key.Original: Avenger to base, enemy IFV neutralized.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"呼叫基地，敵軍步兵戰車已殲滅。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"呼叫基地，敌军步兵战车已歼灭。

Container.name: 90_TankHit
Container.situation: confirming tank hit

Key.Original: Outstanding work, captain.
Key.Chinese: 幹的棒極了，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的棒极了，上尉。

Key.Original: Avenger to base, one enemy MBT has just been torn apart.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"呼叫基地，一臺敵軍主戰坦克已被摧毀。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"呼叫基地，一辆敌军主战坦克已被摧毁。

Container.name: 85_RTB
Container.situation: player has returned to base

Key.Original: Avenger-1 returned to base.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者-1"返回基地了
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者-1"返回基地了

Container.name: 80_TakeOffAgain
Container.situation: taking off after resupplying

Key.Original: Avenger-1 ready to take off, awaiting clearance.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者-1"準備起飛，等待允許中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者-1"准备起飞，等待允许中。

Key.Original: Permission granted, Avenger. Come back in one piece again.
Key.Chinese: 允許起飛，"復仇者"。祝你再次安全歸來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 允许起飞，"复仇者"。祝你再次安全归来。

Container.name: 75_ManyThanks
Container.situation: fia sending tanks

Key.Original: Avenger, the guerrillas send their thanks. Job well done.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，反抗軍表示很感謝。幹的好。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，游击队表示很感谢。干的好。

Container.name: 70_AAFDestroyed
Container.situation: aaf squad destroyed

Key.Original: Great work Avenger, we'll let them know.
Key.Chinese: 幹的很棒，"復仇者"，我會讓他們知道的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的很棒，"复仇者"，我会让他们知道的。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, I've razed those buildings to the ground.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，我已經把建築物給夷平了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，我已经把建筑物给夷平了。

Key.Original: Guerrillas can move in to check it, over.
Key.Chinese: 可以叫反抗軍進去查看，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可以叫游击队去打扫战场了，完毕。

Container.name: 65_AAFLocated
Container.situation: fia located one aaf squad

Key.Original: Crossroads to Avenger, a guerrilla group ran into a Greenback squad a few minutes ago.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"致"復仇者"，一個反抗軍小隊在幾分鐘之前與綠軍相遇了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"致"复仇者"，一支游击队小队在几分钟之前与绿军相遇了。

Key.Original: They're at grid 175-190, hiding in an old construction site and yacht club nearby.
Key.Chinese: 他們的座標在175-190，躲在舊工地與遊艇俱樂部的附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的座标在175-190，躲在旧工地与游艇俱乐部的附近。

Key.Original: They don't have enough firepower to finish them off. If you have some ammo left, you could interdict.
Key.Chinese: 他們並沒擁有足夠的火力去解決敵人。假如你的彈藥還有剩下，你可以去幫助他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们并没拥有足够的火力去解决敌人。假如你的弹药还有剩下，你可以去帮助他们。

Key.Original: Once you get close, they'll designate target positions with orange smoke and their own with green ones.
Key.Chinese: 當你接近的時候，他們會用橘色的煙霧為你標記目標，而綠色的煙霧則是他們自己。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你接近的时候，他们会用橘色的烟雾为你标记目标位置，而绿色的烟雾则是他们自己。

Key.Original: Aim carefully. Do not hit the friendlies.
Key.Chinese: 小心瞄準。不要誤擊到友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小心瞄准。不要误击到友军。

Key.Original: Understood, Crossroads, I'll give it a try.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"交叉路"，我會試試看。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"交叉路口"，我会试试看。

Container.name: 60_GoodHit
Container.situation: jtac confirming hit

Key.Original: Good hit, Avenger. Hawkeye out.
Key.Chinese: 命中，"復仇者"。"鷹眼"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 命中，"复仇者"。"鹰眼"通话完毕。

Container.name: 55_BothSPGDestroyed
Container.situation: both spg destroyed confirmation

Key.Original: Outstanding work.
Key.Chinese: 幹的棒極了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的棒极了。

Key.Original: Crossroads, second artillery system destroyed, how copy?
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，第二臺自走砲也被殲滅了，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，第二辆自行火炮也被歼灭了，收到没有?

Container.name: 50_OneSPGDestroyed
Container.situation: one spg less confirmation

Key.Original: Good work, now locate and neutralize the second, over.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，現在請搜索並摧毀第二臺，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，现在请搜索并摧毁第二辆，完毕。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, one artillery piece found and destroyed, how copy?
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，一臺自走砲已經被殲滅，有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，一辆自行火炮已经被歼灭，有收到吗?

Container.name: 45_SPGFound
Container.participants: EPC B Leader;EPC B HQ;EPC B Abstract A;
Container.situation: jtac has found one spg

Key.Original: Hawkeye to Crossroads, we've just found one of the artillery systems.
Key.Chinese: "鷹眼"致"交叉路"，我們已經找到了一個自走砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰眼"致"交叉路口"，我们已经找到了一辆自行火炮。

Key.Original: We don't have any means to destroy it, but we can laser designate it for Avenger.
Key.Chinese: 我們並沒有能力可以摧毀它，但是我們可以為"復仇者"進行雷射導引。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们没法摧毁它，但是我们可以为"复仇者"进行激光制导。

Key.Original: Avenger, approach from the north-east, we're designating it from this direction. We've also marked its position on GPS. Over.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，請從東北方進場，我們正從這個角度進行導引。我們也在GPS上標記了它的位置。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，请从东北方进场，我们正从这个角度进行导引。我们也在GPS上标记了它的位置。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood, Hawkeye. Avenger, it's time to use some heavy ordnance.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"鷹眼"。"復仇者"，該是時候用一些大傢伙了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"鹰眼"。"复仇者"，该是时候用一些大家伙了。

Key.Original: With pleasure, Crossroads.
Key.Chinese: 我的榮幸，"交叉路"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的荣幸，"交叉路口"。

Container.name: 40_ConvoyDestroyed
Container.situation: player confirming destruction of enemy convoy

Key.Original: Excellent work, Avenger, this should hold up their counter-attack until our reinforcements arrive.
Key.Chinese: 幹的棒極了，"復仇者"，這可以拖延住他們的反攻，並等待我們的援軍抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的棒极了，"复仇者"，这可以拖延住他们的反攻，并等待我们的援军抵达。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, I've neutralized all enemy support vehicles, they won't reach the front line.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，我已經殲滅了敵軍所有的補給載具，它們沒辦法抵達前線了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，我已经歼灭了敌军所有的支援车辆，它们没办法抵达前线了。

Container.name: 35_HeliShotDownCannon
Container.situation: heli shot down cannon call

Key.Original: Good work captain. Now focus on your primary targets.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，上尉。現在請你專注在首要目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，上尉。现在请你专注在首要目标。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, I've sprayed the helo with my cannon, it's going down.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，我用我的機砲打中了直升機，它正在墜落。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，我用我的机炮打中了直升机，它正在坠落。

Container.name: 30_HeliShotDownAA
Container.situation: heli shot down aa call

Key.Original: Good work captain. Now focus on your primary targets.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，上尉。現在請你專注在首要目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，上尉。现在请你专注在首要目标。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, enemy helo successfully hit with an AA missile - it's going down.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，敵軍直升機已被對空飛彈給命中-它正在墜落。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，敌军直升机被一枚空空弹命中-它正在坠落。

Container.name: 25_HeliShotDownDefault
Container.situation: heli shot down default call

Key.Original: Good work, captain. Now focus on your primary targets.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，上尉。現在請你專注在首要目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，上尉。现在请你专注在首要目标。

Key.Original: Avenger to Crossroads, enemy helo successfully intercepted.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"致"交叉路"，已經成功攔截敵軍直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"致"交叉路口"，已经成功拦截敌军直升机。

Container.name: 20_DirectHit
Container.situation: player confirming hit

Key.Original: Direct hit!
Key.Chinese: 直接命中!
Key.Chinesesimp: 直接命中!

Container.name: 15_HeliSpotted
Container.participants: EPC B Leader;EPC B HQ;EPC B Member;
Container.situation: enemy heli spotted on radar

Key.Original: Avenger, they probably want to deploy troops or drop supplies to Greenbacks on this part of the island.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，他們可能是想部屬部隊或空投補給給綠軍的殘餘部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，他们可能是想部署部队或空投补给给绿军的残余部队。

Key.Original: Try to intercept them. Don't forget that the supply convoy remains your primary target.
Key.Chinese: 請試著攔截它。但請不要忘了補給車隊仍是你的首要目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请试着拦截它。但请不要忘了补给车队仍是你的首要目标。

Key.Original: Avenger, radar just picked up a contact far in the north-east.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，雷達在東北方的遠處顯示了一個訊號。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，雷达在东北方的远处显示了一个信号。

Key.Original: It's flying low and heading south-west. Definitely a helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 他飛的很低，並朝著西南方向前進。絕對是一臺直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他飞的很低，并朝着西南方向前进。绝对是一架直升机。

Key.Original: Understood, sir.
Key.Chinese: 了解，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，长官。

Container.name: 135_BombDropped
Container.situation: bomb drop announcement

Key.Original: Dropping bomb!
Key.Chinese: 投擲炸彈!
Key.Chinesesimp: 投掷炸弹!

Container.name: 130_ATMissileFired
Container.situation: at missile announcement

Key.Original: AT missile fired!
Key.Chinese: 反坦克飛彈發射了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 发射反坦克导弹!

Container.name: 125_AAMissileFired
Container.situation: aa missile announcement

Key.Original: AA missile away!
Key.Chinese: 防空飛彈發射了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 发射空空导弹!

Container.name: 120_FlyingFast
Container.situation: flying fast comment

Key.Original: Yeah, this is some speed!
Key.Chinese: 耶，這才叫做速度!
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶，速度与激情!

Container.name: 115_FlyingHigh
Container.situation: flying high comment

Key.Original: Nice view from up here.
Key.Chinese: 這裡的風景真好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里的风景真好。

Container.name: 110_ShipHit
Container.situation: confirming ship hit

Key.Original: Copy, Avenger, continue on mission. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"復仇者"，請繼續任務。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"复仇者"，请继续任务。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Be advised, OPFOR's got one ship less.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，敵方少掉了一臺船隻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，敌方少了一艘船只。

Container.name: 10_InTheAir
Container.situation: player leaving airbase

Key.Original: Avenger-1 in the air.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者-1"在天上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者-1"在天上了。

Key.Original: We'll be watching you on the radar. Good hunting captain.
Key.Chinese: 我們會從雷達上觀察你。祝你獵殺愉快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会从雷达上观察你。祝你猎杀愉快。

Container.name: 105_MRAPHit
Container.situation: confirming mrap hit

Key.Original: Understood, Avenger, but conserve ammo. There's more valuable targets out there. Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"復仇者"，但請你節約彈藥。那裡還有很多更有價值的目標。"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"复仇者"，但请你节约弹药。那里还有很多更有价值的目标。"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Avenger, update, one enemy armored car neutralized.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者"，狀況更新，一臺敵軍裝甲載具已被殲滅。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者"，状况更新，一辆敌军装甲载具已被歼灭。

Container.name: 100_APCHit
Container.situation: confirming apc hit

Key.Original: Good hit, Avenger, Crossroads out.
Key.Chinese: 打得好，"復仇者"，"交叉路"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 打得好，"复仇者"，"交叉路口"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Crossroads, be advised, enemy light armor knocked out.
Key.Chinese: "交叉路"，請注意，敵軍輕裝甲載具已經被解決。
Key.Chinesesimp: "交叉路口"，请注意，敌军轻装甲车辆已经被解决。

Container.name: 05_StartingEngine
Container.situation: starting engine, comm with tower

Key.Original: Avenger-1 starting engines.
Key.Chinese: "復仇者-1"啟動引擎中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "复仇者-1"启动发动机中。

Key.Original: All systems functional, ordnance is ready and armed.
Key.Chinese: 所有系統功能正常，武器與彈藥準備完成。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有系统功能正常，武器与弹药准备完成。

Key.Original: Copy that, Avenger rolling to runway 2.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"復仇者"正滑行到2號跑道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"复仇者"正滑行到2号跑道。

Key.Original: Understood, Avenger, you have a permission to take off.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"復仇者"，你已經允許起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"复仇者"，你已经允许起飞。

Key.Original: Roll to runway 2, the other's still blocked.
Key.Chinese: 請滑行到2號跑道，其它跑道暫時還不能使用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请滑行到2号跑道，其它跑道暂时还不能使用。

Key.Original: Support FIA (optional)
Key.Chinese: 支援自由獨立同盟(支援任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援自由独立同盟(支援任务)

Key.Original: CAS
Key.Chinese: 密接空中支援
Key.Chinesesimp: 近距离空中支援

Key.Original: Find and destroy enemy supply vehicles moving in convoy from %2Molos%1 to %3Paros%1.
Key.Chinese: 尋找並摧毀敵人的補給車隊，他們正在%2莫洛斯%1與%3帕羅斯%1之間移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并摧毁敌人的补给车队，他们正在%2莫洛斯%1与%3帕罗斯%1之间移动。

Key.Original: Destroy Support Vehicles
Key.Chinese: 摧毀補給車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁补给车队

Key.Original: CONVOY
Key.Chinese: 車隊
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队

Key.Original: Get to the %2maintenance area%1 and take your helmet from the supply box.
Key.Chinese: 前往%2維修點%1，並從補給箱中拿取你的頭盔。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往%2维修点%1，并从补给箱中拿取你的头盔。

Key.Original: Preparations
Key.Chinese: 準備工作
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备工作

Key.Original: SUPPLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 補給點
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给点

Key.Original: We've picked up an enemy helicopter moving %2across the sea%1 from north-east to south-west on our radar. They want to either deploy their troops or drop supplies for AAF remnants in the area. Intercept the helicopter before they do so.
Key.Chinese: 我們在雷達上檢測到有一架敵軍直升機正從%2海上%1的東北移動到西南。他們想要部屬部隊或空投補給支援給阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的殘餘部隊。請在他們成功前就攔截下來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在雷达上检测到有一架敌军直升机正从%2海上%1的东北移动到西南。他们想要部属部队或空投补给支援给AAF的残余部队。请在他们成功前就拦截下来。

Key.Original: Interception (optional)
Key.Chinese: 攔截(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 拦截(支线任务)

Key.Original: INTERCEPT
Key.Chinese: 攔截
Key.Chinesesimp: 拦截

Key.Original: Once equipped, move to the hangar and get in %2your jet%1.
Key.Chinese: 拿到裝備後，請移動到機庫並進入%2你的飛機%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿到装备后，请移动到机库并进入%2你的飞机%1。

Key.Original: Get In
Key.Chinese: 進入
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入

Key.Original: HANGAR
Key.Chinese: 機庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 机库

Key.Original: After you have destroyed enemy support units, you can rearm and refuel once when you land at the airbase and roll to the %2maintenance point%1.
Key.Chinese: 在你完成摧毀敵人補給車隊的目標後，你可以回到基地的%2維修點%1來進行彈藥與燃油的補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在你完成摧毁敌人补给车队的目标后，你可以回到基地的%2维修点%1来补充弹药和燃料。

Key.Original: Resupply (optional)
Key.Chinese: 重新整備(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新补给(支线任务)

Key.Original: SUPPLY POINT
Key.Chinese: 補給點
Key.Chinesesimp: 补给点

Key.Original: After you have finished all main tasks or if you can't continue in your mission, return to base and roll back to %2your hangar%1.
Key.Chinese: 當你完成任務之後，請返回基地並滑行到%2你的機庫%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你完成任务之后，请返回基地并滑行到%2你的机库%1。

Key.Original: Return to Base
Key.Chinese: 返回基地
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回基地

Key.Original: HANGAR
Key.Chinese: 機庫
Key.Chinesesimp: 机库

Key.Original:
Find and destroy two enemy self-propelled artillery platforms located at the north of %2the peninsula%1. As high value targets they will certainly be well-camouflaged, but your advanced radar systems should be able to pick up their signatures.

As a secondary target, you can also destroy support vehicles accompanying them.
Key.Chinese:
尋找並摧毀兩座躲藏在%2半島北部%1的敵軍自走砲。他們應該做了相當程度的偽裝，使你難以用肉眼發現他們，不過還好飛機上有先進的雷達系統，它可以幫助你找到躲藏的敵人。

做為第二目標，你也可以在攻擊補給車隊時就順手幹掉他們。
Key.Chinesesimp:
寻找并摧毁两座躲藏在%2半岛北部%1的敌军自行火炮。他们应该做了相当程度的伪装，使你难以用肉眼发现他们，不过还好飞机上有先进的雷达系统，它可以帮助你找到躲藏的敌人。

做为第二目标，你也可以在攻击补给车队时就顺手干掉他们。

Key.Original: Destroy Self-propelled Guns
Key.Chinese: 摧毀自走砲
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁自行火炮

Key.Original: SEEK AND DESTROY
Key.Chinese: 尋找並摧毀
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并摧毁

Key.Original:
1. Equip yourself from a supply crate in the %6maintenance area%1
2. Get into %2your jet%1
3. Roll to the runway and take off
4. Destroy enemy supply vehicles heading from %3Molos%1 to %4Paros%1
6. Find and destroy two enemy %5self-propelled guns%1
7. Return %2back to the base%1

If you are low on fuel, out of ammo or need repairs, return to the airbase for %6maintenance%1 once the convoy is destroyed.
Key.Chinese:
1. 在%6維修點%1的補給箱中拿取你的裝備
2. 進入%2你的飛機%1
3. 滑行到跑道並起飛
4. 摧毀敵人從%3莫洛斯%1到%4帕羅斯%1之間的補給載具
6. 尋找並摧毀兩座敵人的%5自走砲%1
7. 返回%2基地%1

當車隊摧毀掉之後，假如你沒有彈藥或燃油，亦或是需要修理，都可以返回基地的%6維修點%1進行整備。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 在%6维修点%1的补给箱中拿取你的装备
2. 进入%2你的飞机%1
3. 滑行到跑道并起飞
4. 摧毁敌人从%3莫洛斯%1到%4帕罗斯%1之间的补给载具
6. 寻找并摧毁两座敌人的%5自行火炮%1
7. 返回%2基地%1

当车队摧毁掉之后，假如你没有弹药或燃油，亦或是需要修理，都可以返回基地的%6维修点%1进行整备。

Key.Original: Enemy air defenses are now weakened, as our forces were able to destroy both enemy self-propelled AA systems in the area, though with heavy losses. The main threat will be from man-portable short-range AA missiles and large-caliber ground fire, should you fly too low.
Key.Chinese: 我們的部隊在早些時候成功的摧毀了敵人的自行防空炮系統，導致現在敵人的空防能力變弱。現在敵人主要的空防能力是由單兵攜帶的短程地對空飛彈，與大口徑的武器所組成，所以不要飛得太低。
